country_event = { #Senate Appoints President
	id = rusdem.12
	title = rusdem.12.t
	desc = rusdem.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = tereschenko_psr_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = maklakov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_psr_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_tereschenko = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = maklakov_vns_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_maklakov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = teslenko_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = teslenko_vns_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_teslenko = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.52
					days = 1460
				}
			}			
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = romanov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = romanov_vns_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_yusupov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.52
					days = 1460
				}
			}			
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
				has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_vernadskiy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = savitsky_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_savitskiy = yes
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.62
					days = 1360
				}
			}			
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #Senate-Duma Conflict
	id = rusdem.13
	title = rusdem.13.t
	desc = rusdem.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.13.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
				days = 180
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_chosen_duma_side
			unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_Senate_Duma_Conflict_Decisions
			activate_mission = RUS_Senate_Makes_Its_Move
			RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.13.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}			
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			days = 180
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_chosen_senate_side
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_Senate_Duma_Conflict_Decisions
		activate_mission = RUS_Duma_Makes_Its_Move
		RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { #Senate-Duma Conflict
	id = rusdem.16
	title = rusdem.16.t
	desc = rusdem.16.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.16.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_chosen_duma_side
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_duma_pol_power = -15 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_senate_pol_power = 15 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Senate-Duma Conflict
	id = rusdem.20
	title = rusdem.20.t
	desc = rusdem.20.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vasiliy Maklakov"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Mikhail Tereschenko"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 43
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_S_Trubetskoy_hog_sco
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		set_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		load_focus_tree = RUS_SENATE_FOCUS
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
			log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 43
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		add_stability = 0.07
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.24
			days = 30
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_all_preelection_coalitions = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.25
				days = 90
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
			log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Felix Yusupov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 13
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI 
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.154
			days = 3
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Second Tour President
	id = rusdem.22
	title = rusdem.22.t
	desc = rusdem.22.d

	fire_only_once = yes

		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = rus_start_presidential_elections_1936
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
				has_country_flag = savinkov_coup
				has_country_flag = provisional_government
			}	
		}
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
	}

		name = rusdem.22.a

		determine_second_tour_candidates = yes
		count_second_tour_candidates = yes
		activate_mission = rus_president_elections_deadlock
	}
}

country_event = { #Snap elections 1936
	id = rusdem.25
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2"
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_election = yes }	
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma					
		clr_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis					
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
				
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.2.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #PLSR-NSP victory
		name = rusdem.2.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_socialists_victory
		}
		set_country_flag = rus_socialists

		hidden_effect = {
			parties_mp_recalc = yes
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.2.c

					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}

					ruling_party = social_democrat

		}

			parties_mp_recalc = yes
		}
	}

					has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
					has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_victory
		}

				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60

				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}

country_event = { #1941 elections
	id = rusdem.27
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.27"
		set_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941
	}
	title = rusdem.27.t 
	desc = rusdem.27.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
					has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Black_Tsar
					has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
					has_country_flag = RUS_SOLIDARISTS
					has_country_flag = RUS_ABAKUMOV
					has_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV
					has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
					has_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_national_maximalist
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_empire
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_bolshevist
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }			
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = rusdem.27.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}

			popularity = 0.08
		}
	}

country_event = { #Elections 1941
	id = rusdem.29
	immediate = {

		set_country_flag = rus_elections_1941_over
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.29.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
					has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Black_Tsar

					has_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV

					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
					has_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_national_maximalist
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_empire
					has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_bolshevist
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }			
		}
	}

	option = { #PLSR-NSP victory
		name = rusdem.2.b

			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rsdrp_victory

			}

		}
		else = {

			parties_mp_recalc = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #PSR victory
		name = rusdem.2.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = psr_banned
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_psr_victory

		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_hog_sde

			limit = {

				NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Viktor Chernov" ruling_only = yes } }
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Viktor_M_Chernov_for_sde
				RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli
				RUS_Vladimir_L_Burtsev_sec_sde
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Fanni_Y_Kaplan_for_sde
				RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli
				RUS_Vladimir_L_Burtsev_sec_sde
			}
		}
			
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_rev_party
			long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			parties_mp_recalc = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #RPR victory
		name = rusdem.29.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rpr_victory
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_rpr_victory
			}
			set_country_flag = national_populist_coalition
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_leader = { name = "Viktor Chernov" ruling_only = yes } }
				}
				add_ideas = {
					RUS_Viktor_M_Chernov_for_sde
					RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli

				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = {
					RUS_Fanni_Y_Kaplan_for_sde
					RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sli
					RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
				}
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			parties_mp_recalc = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { #PM
	id = rusdem.30
	title = rusdem.23.t
	desc = rusdem.23.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.23.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_socialists_victory
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
				}
			}
			
		}
		add_stability = -0.2
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = syndicalist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Ustinov_for_syn
			RUS_Sergey_P_Medvedev_eco_syn
			RUS_Yuri_Lutovinov_sec_syn
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
	} 
	option = {
		name = rusdem.23.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_socialists_victory
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination

				}
			}

					election_frequency = 60

				}

			popularity = 0.05
		}

		add_to_coalition = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
	}

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.50
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_presidential_elections = yes }
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
	}
	title = rusdem.50.t
	desc = rusdem.50.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

			has_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		}

				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}

			has_country_flag = vergun_nsnp_candidate
		}
		RUS_setup_president_vergun = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.w
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_ELECTION_nrpr_president_victory
			has_country_flag = trushnovich_nsnp_candidate
		}
		RUS_setup_president_trushnovich = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		trigger = {

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.64
	immediate = {
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { plsr_support = plsr_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { nsp_support = nrpr_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { psr_support = psr_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { rsdrp_support = rsdrp_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { lkdp_support = lkdp_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { rkdp_support = rkdp_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { vns_support = vns_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { ep_support = ep_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { nrpr_support = nrpr_total_mp }
			set_temp_variable = { nsnp_support = nsnp_total_mp }
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
				add_to_temp_variable = { plsr_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
				add_to_temp_variable = { nsp_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { psr_in_power = yes }
				add_to_temp_variable = { psr_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
				add_to_temp_variable = { rsdrp_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { lkdp_in_power = yes }
				add_to_temp_variable = { lkdp_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { rkdp_in_power = yes }
				add_to_temp_variable = { rkdp_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
				add_to_temp_variable = { vns_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
				add_to_temp_variable = { ep_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
				add_to_temp_variable = { nrpr_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_Viktor_M_Baydalakov_hog_npo }
				add_to_temp_variable = { nsnp_support = independent_total_mp }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { plsr_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { plsr_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = plsr_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { nsp_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { nsp_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = nsp_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { psr_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { psr_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = psr_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { rsdrp_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = rsdrp_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { lkdp_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = lkdp_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { rkdp_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = rkdp_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { vns_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { vns_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = vns_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { ep_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > nrpr_support }
					check_variable = { ep_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = ep_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { nrpr_support > nsnp_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = nrpr_wins_president
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > plsr_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > nsp_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > psr_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > rsdrp_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > lkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > rkdp_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > vns_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > ep_support }
					check_variable = { nsnp_support > nrpr_support }
				}
				set_country_flag = nsnp_wins_president
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.64.t
	desc = rusdem.64.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = plsr_wins_president
		}
		RUS_setup_president_kamkov = yes
		clr_country_flag = plsr_wins_president
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.b
		trigger = {

		}

		clr_country_flag = plsr_wins_president

			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1360
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nsp_wins_president
		}
		RUS_setup_president_shlyapnikov = yes
		clr_country_flag = nsp_wins_president
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {

			}
		}

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.66
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_count_senate_elects_president = yes
		}
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
	}
	title = rusdem.63.t
	desc = rusdem.66.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
				has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
		has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.a
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.b
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = shteinberg_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Impeachment
	id = rusdem.106
	title = rusdem.106.t
	desc = rusdem.106.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.106.a
		random_list = {
			60 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					check_variable = { RUS.senate_support > RUS.half_senate_plus_one }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -30
					check_variable = { RUS.senate_support < RUS.half_senate_plus_one }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.107
					days = 7
				}
			}
			40 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					check_variable = { RUS.senate_support > RUS.half_senate_plus_one }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -20
					check_variable = { RUS.senate_support < RUS.half_senate_plus_one }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.107
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}
country_event = { #Impeachment
	id = rusdem.107
	title = rusdem.107.t
	desc = rusdem.107.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.107.a
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Impeachment
	id = rusdem.108
	title = rusdem.108.t
	desc = rusdem.108.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.108.a
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_political_power = -100
	}
}
country_event = { #Important thing to ask
	id = rusdem.109
	title = rusdem.109.t
	desc = rusdem.109.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_will_go_socialist
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_wont_go_socialist
		set_country_flag = RUS_decided_to_stay_democratic
	}
}

state_event = { #set flag
	id = rusdem.110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.110" }

	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		clr_state_flag = RUS_propaganda_in_this_state
		
	}
}

country_event = { #PLSR/NSP
	id = rusdem.302
	title = rusdem.302.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.302.d.president
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.302.d.notpresident
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
				}
			}
		}
	}	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.302.a
		add_political_power = 5		
	}
}

			}

	desc = rusdem.304.d

		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = rus_election_1936
		has_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		has_socialist_government = yes
		check_variable = { army_support < 0.5 }
	}

		days = 7
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.304.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_army_mutiny
	}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.317
	title = rusdem.317.t
	desc = rusdem.317.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.319
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.318
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				days = 60
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				days = 30
			}
		}			
	}
}

			}

				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {

				id = rusdem.323
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.321.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		clear_embargo_FROM = yes
		FROM = {

				id = rusdem.322

			}
		}

			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.324

			}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.322
	title = rusdem.322.t
	desc = rusdem.322.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.322.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = 0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 1 }
		FROM = { 
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russian_factory_output = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories = -0.05 }
		}
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits }
				}
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_foreign_profits_modifier }
				hidden_effect = { add_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits }
			}
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
	}
}

				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = -0.025 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = -1 }
		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russian_factory_output = -0.05 }
			add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories = 0.05 }
		}
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
				}
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_foreign_profits_modifier }
				hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits }
			}
		}	
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
	}
}

				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = -0.025 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = -1 }
		}
		add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russian_factory_output = -0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories = 0.05 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_foreign_profits_modifier }
			hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits }
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes	
	}
}
country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.328
	title = rusdem.328.t
	desc = rusdem.328.d
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = SOV
		}
		has_idea = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_max_efficiency = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_resource_gain = 0 }
		check_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 0 }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.328.a
		remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier_idea }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_foreign_profits_modifier }
			hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits }
		}
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_max_efficiency
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_construction_speed
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_factory_output
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_resource_gain
		clear_variable = RUS_foreign_factories
		clear_variable = Foreign_Russian_factory_output
		clear_variable = Foreign_Russia_consumer_goods_factories
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rusdem.330
	title = rusdem.330.t
	desc = rusdem.330.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.330.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.1
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.8
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.1
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			add_ideas = SOV_Rodion_Malinovskiy_carm
		}
	}
	title = rcw.1.t
	desc = rcw.1.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Recreate_The_Cheka
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.3
						days = 5
					}
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.2
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				60 = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.3
						days = 5
					}
				}
				40 = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.2
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.1.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_RCW
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = RCW_kornilov_ready_for_uprising
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.8
				days = 3
			}
			#country_event = {
			#	id = rcw.4
			#	days = 3
			#}
		}				
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.2
	immediate = { set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
	title = rcw.2.t
	desc = rcw.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.2.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		kill_ideology_leader = paternal_autocrat
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Anton Denikin"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				set_country_flag = RCW_denikin_ready_for_uprising
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.15
					days = 2
				}
				#country_event = {
				#	id = rcw.14
				#	days = 5
				#}
			}
			34 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.8
					days = 3
				}
			}
			33 = {
				set_country_flag = RCW_wrangel_ready_for_uprising
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.16
					days = 3
				}
				#country_event = {
				#	id = rcw.11
				#	days = 2
				#}
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		kill_ideology_leader = paternal_autocrat
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Anton Denikin"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
		}
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				set_country_flag = RCW_denikin_ready_for_uprising
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.15
					days = 2
				}
				#country_event = {
				#	id = rcw.14
				#	days = 5
				#}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.8
					days = 3
				}
			}
			25 = {
				set_country_flag = RCW_wrangel_ready_for_uprising
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.16
					days = 3
				}
				#country_event = {
				#	id = rcw.11
				#	days = 2
				#}
			}
		}				
	}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.4
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 652
						state = 251
						state = 239
						state = 401
						state = 265
						state = 217
						state = 236
					}
				}
				set_demilitarized_zone = yes
			}
		}
	}
	title = rcw.4.t
	desc = rcw.4.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.4.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.5
			days = 2
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 652
						state = 251
						state = 239
						state = 401
						state = 265
						state = 217
						state = 236
					}
				}
				set_demilitarized_zone = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.4.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		random_list = {
			70 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					check_variable = { popular_support < 0.2 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.6
					days = 2
				}
			}
			30 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.19 }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.18
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.4.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_government = syndicalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_RCW
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.6
			days = 2
		}
	}	
}

			remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_carm_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		set_country_flag = RCW_wrangel_ready_for_uprising
		#country_event = {
		#	id = rcw.16
		#	days = 3
		#}
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.11
			days = 2
		}
	}	
}

	id = rcw.12
	title = rcw.12.t
	desc = rcw.12.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = psr_banned
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.25
			days = 60
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Pyotr Wrangel"
			desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			traits = { RUS_black_baron }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_kirill = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 2
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.12.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		load_focus_tree = RUS_JUNTA_FOCUS
		add_stability = -0.075
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel_Tsar.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = { RUS_black_baron }
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.4
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

	id = rcw.13
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 401
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 401
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_carm_ade
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_carm_ade
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
			}
			add_ideas = SOV_Aleksandr_Vasilevskiy_cos
		}
	}
	title = rcw.13.t
	desc = rcw.13.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.13.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				70 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10000
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_RCW
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.15
						days = 2
					}
				}
				30 = {
					set_country_flag = RCW_denikin_ready_for_uprising
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.15
						days = 2
					}
					#country_event = {
					#	id = rcw.14
					#	days = 2
					#}
				}
			}
		}	
	}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {

				days = 2
			}

			#	id = rcw.14
			#	days = 2
			#}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.13.c
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Recreate_The_Cheka
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		hidden_effect = {

					modifier = {

							is_ai = yes

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.16
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 400
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 400
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_carm_ade
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_carm_ade
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_cos_ade
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_cos_ade
			}
		}
	}
	title = rcw.16.t
	desc = rcw.16.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.16.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Recreate_The_Cheka
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_von_Rommel_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_A_Lokhvitski_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Rodzyanko_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_P_Arkhangelskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_von_Rommel_dead
		set_country_flag = Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_K_Miller_dead
		set_country_flag = Igor_I_Sikorskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vyacheslav_Tkachov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead
		set_country_flag = Pavel_N_Shatilov_dead
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_kornilov_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_denikin_officer
					has_trait = RUS_markov_officer
					has_id = 78823
					has_id = 78824
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.17
			days = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = { additional_army_support = 0.3 }
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			transfer_units_fraction = {
				target = TRM
				size = 0.1
				army_ratio = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.16.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_von_Rommel_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_A_Lokhvitski_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Rodzyanko_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_P_Arkhangelskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_von_Rommel_dead
		set_country_flag = Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_K_Miller_dead
		set_country_flag = Igor_I_Sikorskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vyacheslav_Tkachov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead
		set_country_flag = Pavel_N_Shatilov_dead
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_kornilov_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_denikin_officer
					has_trait = RUS_markov_officer
					has_id = 78823
					has_id = 78824
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.17
			days = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = { additional_army_support = 0.5 }
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = 0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			transfer_units_fraction = {
				target = TRM
				size = 0.05
				army_ratio = 0.05
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.19
	title = rcw.19.t
	desc = rcw.19.d
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.19.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			DKB = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.20
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ALO = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.20
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.20
	title = rcw.20.t
	desc = rcw.20.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.20.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					tag = DKB
					don_is_pro_german = no
				}
				tag = ALO
				AND = {
					tag = KUB
					kuban_is_pro_german = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				AND = {
					FROM = { RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes }
					ROOT = { tag = ALO }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				tag = KUB
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = ALO
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.21
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.21
					days = 2
				}
			}
			KUB = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.20
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.20.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					tag = DKB
					has_completed_focus = DKB_progerman_politic
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
				AND = {
					tag = KUB
					kuban_is_pro_german = no
				}
				tag = ALO
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				AND = {
					FROM = { RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes }
					ROOT = { tag = ALO }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RCW_will_intervene
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.22
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.20.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.23
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.21
	title = rcw.21.t
	desc = rcw.21.d	
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.21.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			}
			FROM = { dismantle_faction = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			create_faction = "South-Eastern Union"
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.24
	title = rcw.24.t
	desc = rcw.24.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = GER
		russian_civil_war = yes
		AND = {
			country_exists = BAT
			BAT = { is_subject_of = GER }
			880 = { owner = { is_neighbor_of = BAT } }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.24.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				don_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				195 = { owner = { has_socialist_government = yes } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				195 = { owner = { has_government = national_populist } }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		hidden_effect = {
			195 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.25
						days = 10
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.24.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				don_is_pro_german = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.25
	title = rcw.25.t
	desc = rcw.25.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.25.a
		setup_western_russian_army = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = SOV } }
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = RRF } }
			}
			RRF = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		RVA = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.26
				days = 2
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = WRA
			type = civil_war
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1		
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.25.b
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		setup_western_russian_army = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = SOV } }
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROOT = { NOT = { tag = RRF } }
			}
			RRF = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.26
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		RVA = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.26
				days = 2
			}
		}
		WRA = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
	}
}

		tag = WHR
		russian_civil_war = yes

			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				is_subject_of = GER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.28
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.27.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				is_subject_of = GER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		210 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		242 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		243 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		755 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		880 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		242 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.31
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 210
					state = 242
					state = 243
					state = 755
					state = 880
				}
			}
			WHR = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.27.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -50
	}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.32
	title = rcw.32.t
	desc = rcw.32.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = ALO
		NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
		is_subject = no
		russian_civil_war = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rcw.32.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		583 = {
			add_claim_by = ALO
		}
		588 = {
			add_claim_by = ALO
		}
		582 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		590 = {
			add_claim_by = WHR
		}
		588 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.33
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
				588 = { NOT = { is_owned_by = RUS } }
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.33
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SOV
				588 = { NOT = { is_owned_by = SOV } }
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.33
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SIB
				SIB = { is_subject = no }
				588 = { NOT = { is_owned_by = SIB } }
			}
			SIB = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.33
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = TRM
				TRM = { is_subject = no }
				588 = { NOT = { is_owned_by = TRM } }
			}
			TRM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.33
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 583
					state = 588
					state = 582
					state = 590
				}
			}
			ALO = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.32.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
	}
}

	id = rcw.35
	title = rcw.35.t
	desc = rcw.35.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rcw.35.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_siberia = yes
				NOT = { state = 653 }
				NOT = { state = 583 }
				NOT = { state = 588 }
				NOT = { state = 582 }
				NOT = { state = 572 }
				NOT = { state = 590 }
			}
			SIB = { add_state_core = PREV }
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
			force_enable_resistance = {
				occupied = SIB
				occupier = ROOT
			}
			start_resistance = yes
			set_resistance = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = RCW_should_deal_with_siberian_revolt
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_Siberian_Insurgency_decisions
	}		
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.37
	title = rcw.37.t
	desc = rcw.37.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		russian_civil_war = yes
		country_exists = RVA
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = FIN_diplomacy }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.37.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		FIN = {
			transfer_state = 215
			transfer_state = 216
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 215
							state = 216
						}
					}
					
					remove_core_of = SOV
					remove_core_of = RUS
					remove_core_of = RRF
					remove_core_of = RVA
					remove_claim_by = FIN
					if = {
						limit = {
							country_exists = SOV
						}
						add_claim_by = SOV
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							country_exists = RUS
						}
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							country_exists = RRF
						}
						add_claim_by = RRF
					}					
					if = {
						limit = {
							country_exists = RVA
						}
						add_claim_by = RVA
					}					
					add_core_of = FIN
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.34
				days = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = SOV
				}
				SOV = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.38
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = RUS
				}
				RUS = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.38
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = RRF
				}
				RRF = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.38
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}					
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = RVA
				}
				RVA = {
					country_event = {
						id = rcw.38
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.37.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}	
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.38
	title = rcw.38.t
	desc = rcw.38.d	
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.38.a
		trigger = {
			FROM = { is_in_faction = no }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				is_neighbor_of = FROM
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = { is_in_faction = no }
			FROM = { has_guarantor = no }
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.38.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_neighbor_of = FROM
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		add_stability = -0.01
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 213
				owns_state = 722
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.39
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

							state = 722

						}
					}

						}

					}

					}

				}
			}

	id = rcw.40
	title = rcw.40.t
	desc = rcw.40.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RVA
		country_exists = RRF
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RCW_begun }
		NOT = { has_war_with = RRF }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.40.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		RRF = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.41
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.40.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = rcw.46

	desc = rcw.46.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

			factor = 80
		}

		add_political_power = 15
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.46.b

			factor = 20
		}

		add_political_power = -50
	}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.47
	title = rcw.47.t
	desc = rcw.47.d	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = LAT
		has_completed_focus = LAT_look_to_russian_bolshevism
		has_socialist_government = yes
		has_global_flag = RCW_begun
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RCW_over }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.47.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Grigory Zinoviev"
			desc = "POLITICS_GRIGORY_ZINOVIEV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Grigoriy_Zinoviev.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = totalist_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = SOV_totalist_party
			long_name = SOV_totalist_party_long
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_russian_generals_will_return
		ENG = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer 
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		FRA = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer 
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		FOP = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer 
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_ideas = SOV_chaotic_revolution
		add_ideas = RCW_minor
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RVA
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RVA
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RRF
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RRF
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = WRA
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = WRA
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SOV
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = SOV
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			set_temp_variable = { units_to_spawn = state_population_k }
			divide_temp_variable = { units_to_spawn = 500 }
			clamp_temp_variable = { var = units_to_spawn min = 1 max = 12 }
			set_temp_variable = { total_units_to_spawn = units_to_spawn }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RCW_recruit_units
			set_temp_variable = { counter = 1 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { var = units_to_spawn value = 1 compare = greater_than_or_equals }
				}
				ROOT = { create_SOV_militia_template = yes }
				for_loop_effect = {
					start = 1
					end = units_to_spawn
					compare = less_than_or_equals

					meta_effect = {
						text = {
							create_unit = {
								division = "name = [DIVISION] division_template = [TEMPLATE] start_experience_factor = 0.0"
								allow_spawning_on_enemy_provs = yes
								owner = ROOT
								id = 1776
							}
						}
						DIVISION = "\\\"[?counter]aya [THIS.GetName] [GetRCWMilitiaName]\\\""
						TEMPLATE = "\\\"[GetRCWMilitiaTemplate]\\\""
					}
					add_to_temp_variable = { counter = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = LAT_bolsheviks_intervene_in_RCW
	}	
}

		set_global_flag = RCW_begun

	}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.101
	title = rcw.101.t
	desc = rcw.101.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RCW_begun
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = RUS
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				has_war_with = TRM
			}
			AND = {
				tag = SOV
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				has_war_with = TRM
			}
			AND = {
				tag = RRF
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				has_war_with = TRM
			}
			AND = {
				tag = RVA
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				has_war_with = TRM
			}
			AND = {
				tag = WRA
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				has_war_with = TRM
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
			
	option = {
		name = rcw.101.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = RRF
			}
		}
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.102
				days = 2
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.101.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 99
				tag = RRF
			}
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.103
	title = rcw.103.t
	desc = rcw.103.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
			
	option = {
		name = rcw.103.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = KR_separate_peace
		hidden_effect = {
			save_event_target_as = peace_country

			# first peace out with faction leaders
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = TRM
						is_subject_of = TRM
						is_in_faction_with = TRM
					}
				}
				event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_siberia = yes
			}
			TRM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}
}
