country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.105
	title = rcw.105.t
	desc = rcw.105.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RCW_begun
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = RUS
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				NOT = { has_war_with = TRM }
			}
			AND = {
				tag = SOV
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				NOT = { has_war_with = TRM }
			}
			AND = {
				tag = RRF
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				NOT = { has_war_with = TRM }
			}
			AND = {
				tag = RVA
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
				NOT = { has_war_with = TRM }
			}
			AND = {
				tag = WRA
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { has_war_with = TRM }
			}
			AND = {
				tag = TRM
				NOT = { country_exists = RUS }
				NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
				NOT = { country_exists = RRF }
				NOT = { country_exists = RVA }
				NOT = { country_exists = WRA }
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 3
	}
			
	option = {
		name = rcw.105.a
		set_global_flag = RCW_over
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RVA
			}
			setup_rva_cw_victory = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = WRA
			}
			setup_wra_cw_victory = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RRF
			}
			setup_rrf_cw_victory = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			setup_sov_cw_victory = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			setup_rus_cw_victory = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				tag = TRM
			}
			setup_trm_cw_victory = yes
		}		
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.200
	title = rcw.200.t
	desc = rcw.200.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.200.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PLSR
					}
				}	
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { NOT = { state = 195 } }
			set_demilitarized_zone = yes
		}
		setup_rcw_workers_initial = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.201
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.202
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.100
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.35
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.200.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
				}	
			}
		}
		create_dynamic_country = {	#Soviets
			original_tag = RUS
			copy_tag = RUS

			#State
			transfer_state = 195
			
			set_stability = 0.1
			set_war_support = 0.4
			
			### Politics
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 12
				radical_socialist = 44
				syndicalist = 24
				social_democrat = 20
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = radical_socialist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			set_country_flag = soc_dems_are_socialists
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Revolutionary Workers"
				desc = "POLITICS_REV_WORKERS_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Workers.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = SOV_workers_rev
				long_name = SOV_workers_rev_long
			}
			
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_workers
		
			#Event Target
			save_global_event_target_as = soviet_russia
			
			load_focus_tree = Russia_Socialist
			
			add_ideas = SOV_chaotic_revolution
			country_lock_all_division_template = yes
			reserve_dynamic_country = yes
		}
		transfer_units_fraction = {
				target = event_target:soviet_russia
				size = 0.12
				navy_ratio = 0.2
				keep_unit_leaders_trigger = { always = yes }
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.206
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.100
				days = 40
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.201
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Rykov" type = destroyer target = XXA }
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Samson" type = destroyer target = XXA }
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Svoboda" type = destroyer target = XXA }
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Zabiyaka" type = destroyer target = XXA }
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Forel" type = destroyer target = XXA }
			transfer_ship = { prefer_name = "Losos" type = destroyer target = XXA }

				id = russia.1946
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.5
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

		}

			SOV_nationalist_resistance
			SOV_monarchist_resistance
			SOV_democrat_resistance
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_must_deal_with_opposition

			limit = { has_id = 607 }
			promote_leader = yes
		}

		name = rcw.201.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1

			}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.202
	title = rcw.202.t
	desc = rcw.202.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_event_zinoviev
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rcw.202.a
		trigger = {
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 137
					region = 135
				}
			}
			RVA = {
				add_state_core = PREV
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		RVA = {
			transfer_technology_without_doctrines = yes
			country_lock_all_division_template = yes
			RUS_transfer_russian_ideas = yes
			add_political_power = 100
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_demilitarized_zone = yes }
				set_demilitarized_zone = no
			}
			load_focus_tree = RUS_JUNTA_FOCUS
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.19
				days = 5
			}
		}
		transfer_units_fraction = {
				target = RVA
				size = 0.42
				navy_ratio = 0.2
				keep_unit_leaders_trigger = { always = yes }
		}		
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_state_category = five
					has_state_category = six
					has_state_category = seven
					has_state_category = eight
					has_state_category = nine
					has_state_category = ten
					has_state_category = eleven
					has_state_category = twelve
					region = 132
					is_core_rrf_state = no
				}
			}
			set_demilitarized_zone = no
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rcw.203
			days = 3
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

	}

		annex_country = { target = event_target:soviet_russia }
		add_stability = 0.25
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.50
			days = 3
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rcw.212
	title = rcw.212.t
	desc = rcw.212.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rcw.212.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { 
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_country_flag = TRM_NRA_coup
				}
			}
			TRM = {
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					add_core_of = TRM
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			TRM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.214
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		create_field_marshal = {
			name = "Vasily Blyukher"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Vasily_Blyukher.png"
			id = 505050
			traits = {
				offensive_doctrine
				politically_connected
				trickster
			}
			skill = 3
			attack_skill = 3
			defense_skill = 1
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 1
		}
		create_corps_commander = {
			name = "Genrikh Eikhe"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/TRM/TRM_Genrikh_Eikhe.png"
			id = 505049
			traits = {
				politically_connected
				infantry_leader
				trait_engineer
			}
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 1
			defense_skill = 2
			planning_skill = 1
			logistics_skill = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = { load_oob = "SIB_NRA" }
	}
	option = {
		name = rcw.212.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { 
					has_country_flag = TRM_Dem_coup
					has_democratic_government = yes
				}
			}
			TRM = {
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					add_core_of = TRM
				}
			}
			
		}
		else = {
			TRM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.213
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rcw.216.a
		annex_country = { target = FROM }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = FROM }
			add_core_of = TRM
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = RUS
					tag = SOV
					tag = RRF
					tag = RVA
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.34
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

		name = rcw.217.a
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = civil_war
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_id = 505055
					has_id = 50004
					has_id = 50003
				}
			}
			set_nationality = SIB
		}		
		remove_ideas = TRM_oblastniki_influence_idea
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TRM_oblastniki_influence_modifier }
			clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_stability
			clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_war_support
			clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_resource_gain
			clear_variable = TRM_oblastniki_conscription
		}
		set_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_banned
		clr_country_flag = TRM_oblastniki_operate
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0
		}
	}
}

					}

	id = rusdem.365
	title = rusdem.365.t
	desc = rusdem.365.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.365.a

			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.15
		}

		add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = vns_final_senators }
		set_variable = { lkdp_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { nrpr_final_senators = temp1 }
		senators_support_calc = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_Senate_Submits
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Senate_Backs_Down
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
	}
}

country_event = { #NRPR
	id = rusdem.372
	title = rusdem.372.t
	desc = rusdem.372.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.372.a
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Threaten_The_Supreme_Court
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Influence_The_Supreme_Court
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -15
					check_variable = { popular_support < 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.6 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -10
					check_variable = { army_support < 0.6 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.374
					days = 5
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Threaten_The_Supreme_Court
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					has_completed_focus = RUS_Influence_The_Supreme_Court
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					check_variable = { popular_support < 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.6 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = { army_support < 0.6 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.373
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #NRPR
	id = rusdem.375
	title = rusdem.375.t
	desc = rusdem.375.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_rus_savinkoc_event
	option = {
		name = rusd.65.a
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		hidden_effect = {
			reset_russian_leaders = yes
			set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
			set_country_flag = RUS_dictatorship
			clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Boris Savinkov"
				desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_SAVINKOV_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov_President.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = { vozhd }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			219 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			add_stability = 0.15
			RUS = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
			}
			
			load_focus_tree = RUS_SAVINKOV_FOCUS
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.61
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #NRPR
	id = rusdem.376
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					195 = { is_demilitarized_zone = no }
				}
				195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.376.t
	desc = rusdem.376.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.376.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Ensure_Duma_Support
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.377
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.376.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Ensure_Senate_Support
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.378
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.376.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.380
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.376.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		add_stability = -0.01
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				70 = {
					modifier = {
						add = 30
						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10000
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_RCW
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.381
						days = 1
					}
				}
				30 = {
					modifier = {
						add = -30
						has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov
					}
					modifier = {
						add = 70
						NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Kornilov_supported_Savinkov }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10000
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_RCW
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusdem.384
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	id = rusdem.380
	title = rusdem.380.t
	desc = rusdem.380.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.380.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { popular_support < 0.5 }
			check_variable = { army_support  < 0.5 }
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		clr_country_flag = savinkov_coup
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.383
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.380.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { popular_support > 0.5 }
				check_variable = { army_support > 0.5 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.385
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Provisional Government
	id = rusdem.383
	title = rusdem.383.t
	desc = rusdem.383.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.383.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			219 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 1
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = provisional_government
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		restore_all_presidential_candidates = yes
		clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		reset_russian_leaders = yes
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "The Senate"
			desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_mp = 0 }
		
		set_variable = { var = senate_total value = 150 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.3
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.25
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #No army by kornilov
	id = rusdem.384
	title = rusdem.384.t
	desc = rusdem.384.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.384.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { popular_support < 0.4 }
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		clr_country_flag = savinkov_coup
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.386
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.384.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { popular_support > 0.4 }
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.385
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kornilov decides fate of russia
	id = rusdem.386
	title = rusdem.386.t
	desc = rusdem.386.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.386.a
		hidden_effect = {
			195 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
			219 = { set_demilitarized_zone = no }
		}
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		clr_country_flag = savinkov_coup
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_RRF
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_RRF_1
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF_1
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.24
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.386.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.383
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.387
	title = rusdem.387.t
	desc = rusdem.387.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.387.a
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.388
					days = 2
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.7 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -5
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.8 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -10
					check_variable = { popular_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -10
					check_variable = { army_support > 0.9 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_RCW
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.389
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.388
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	title = rusdem.388.t
	desc = rusdem.388.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.388.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = hidden_sympathies
				}
				set_nationality = SOV
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_trait = hidden_sympathies
				}
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Vasiliy_I_Chuykov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_D_Bonch_Bruyevich_dead 
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_F_Vatutin_dead 
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead 
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_S_Konev_dead 
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Rodzyanko_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_P_Arkhangelskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Lavrentiy_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_K_Miller_dead
		set_country_flag = Igor_I_Sikorskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vyacheslav_Tkachov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			kill_ideology_leader = paternal_autocrat
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.375
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

			elections_allowed = no
		}

			}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.414
	title = rusdem.414.t
	desc = rusdem.414.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes > RUS_rkdp_votes }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_secured
		set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_votes < RUS_rkdp_votes }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_failed
		add_political_power = -15
	}	
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.416
	title = rusdem.416.t
	desc = rusdem.416.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.416.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
			}
			clr_country_flag = radical_socialist_coalition
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
			}
			clr_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
			}
			clr_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.12
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.04
		}		
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_soc_land }
	}
}

						name = "Lev Gershtein"
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10000
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.420
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}		
	}
}

	id = rusdem.421
	title = rusdem.421.t
	desc = rusdem.421.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.421.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Viktor Chernov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			retire_country_leader = yes
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Lev Gershtein"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			retire_country_leader = yes
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Nikolay Avksentiev"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			retire_country_leader = yes
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 10
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_democrat_party
			long_name = RUS_social_democrat_party_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.25
			days = 60
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.424
	title = rusdem.424.t
	desc = rusdem.424.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.424.a
		setup_soviet_psr = yes
		set_variable = { var = radsoc value = party_popularity@radical_socialist }
		set_variable = { var = synd value = party_popularity@syndicalist }
		set_variable = { var = tot value = party_popularity@totalist }
		set_variable = { var = socdem value = party_popularity@social_democrat }
		multiply_variable = { var = radsoc value = 100 }
		multiply_variable = { var = synd value = 100 }
		multiply_variable = { var = tot value = 100 }
		multiply_variable = { var = socdem value = 100 }
		SOV = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 25
				radical_socialist = 25
				syndicalist = 25
				social_democrat = 25
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
				}
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = tot
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = synd
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = radsoc
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = socdem
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.429
	title = rusdem.429.t
	desc = rusdem.429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.429.a
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 403
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 416
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					has_id = 402
				}
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = rusdem.430
					days = 100
					random = 50
					random_days = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = {
	id = rusdem.430
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.430" }
	title = rusdem.430.t
	desc = rusdem.430.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_military_planning

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusdem.430.a
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 402
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 402
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Anton Denikin"
					desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
					picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
			
			}
		}		
	}
}

			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		set_country_flag = lkdp_banned
		set_country_flag = rkdp_banned
		set_country_flag = vns_banned
		set_country_flag = ep_banned
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
	}	
}

		set_variable = { plsr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsnp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #RSDRP
	id = rusdem.471
	title = rusdem.471.t
	desc = rusdem.471.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.471.a
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_total_senate_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
}

	id = rusdem.507
	title = rusdem.507.t
	desc = rusdem.507.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = rusdem.507.a
		add_stability = 0.03
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_2
				add_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_3
			}
		}
		else = {

		}
	}

country_event = { #LKDP
	id = rusdem.508
	title = rusdem.508.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.508.d.senatereform
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.508.d.nosenatereform
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.508.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
			}
			add_stability = 0.03
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = loc_parl_accepted
			}
			add_political_power = 25
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_blocked
			}
			add_stability = 0.01
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.01
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = loc_parl_blocked
			}
			add_political_power = -25
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #KDP
	id = rusdem.520
	title = rusdem.520.t
	desc = rusdem.520.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.520.a
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_coalition
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = psr_coalition
		set_country_flag = market_liberal_coalition
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	} 
}

country_event = { #KDP
	id = rusdem.525
	title = rusdem.525.t
	desc = rusdem.525.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.525.a
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = social_conservative
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = social_liberal_coalition
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		parties_mp_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Pavel_N_Milyukov_dead }
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Shulgin_sec_sco
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Leontief_eco_mli
				RUS_Vasiliy_Shulgin_sec_sco
			}
		}
	} 
}
country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.526

	desc = rusdem.526.d

		name = rusdem.526.a

		set_country_flag = VNS_aristocratic
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.526.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Dmitriy Romanov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Felix Yusupov"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_P_Ignatiev_hog_sco
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		set_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau
	}

country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.531
	title = rusdem.531.t
	desc = rusdem.531.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.531.a
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		set_country_flag = psr_banned
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		set_variable = { plsr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_mp = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { plsr_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_final_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_total_regional_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_final_senators = 0 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_total_mp }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_total_mp }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = mp_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > mp_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = mp_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_mp = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < mp_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = mp_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_mp = temp1 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_political_instability
			days = 365
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
	}
}

			limit = {

			}

				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

		name = rusdem.555.a

			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_TSAR_WRANGEL_TT
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy = 0.37 }

			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.559
				days = 6
			}

				id = rusdem.562
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.563
				days = 14
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.565
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.555.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		country_event = rusdem.556
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_VSEVOLOD
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_VSEV
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_TSAR_VSEV_TT
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy = 0.6 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.559
				days = 6
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.563
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.564
				days = 18
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.565
				days = 24
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 17
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_ROMAN
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ROMAN
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_TSAR_ROMAN_TT
		set_variable = { RUS_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy = 0.45 }

				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination

			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_votes_yes < 0.6 }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_referendum_is_rigged
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig

			modifier = {

				check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_votes_yes < 0.6 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.07

country_event = { #Monarchy Referendum
	id = rusdem.568
	title = rusdem.568.t
	desc = rusdem.568.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.568.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Referendum_Fails
		remove_ideas = RUS_socialists_protest_the_referendum
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.512
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.527
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Monarchy Referendum
	id = rusdem.570
	title = rusdem.570.t
	desc = rusdem.570.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.570.a
		add_stability = 0.12
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_socialists_protest_the_referendum
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchists_win_referendum
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_AND
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
					check_variable = { RUS_monarchy_votes_yes < 0.5 }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.571
				days = 2
			}
		}					
	}
}

		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Anastasia I"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		has_democratic_government = yes
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}

		name = rusdem.572.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.573
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Flavour for monarchy
	id = rusdem.577
	title = rusdem.577.t
	desc = rusdem.577.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.577.a
		add_stability = 0.15
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.578
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Flavour for monarchy
	id = rusdem.578
	title = rusdem.578.t
	desc = rusdem.578.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.578.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.579
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.578.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.580
			days = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.512
				days = 7
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.527
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Flavour for monarchy
	id = rusdem.579
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA }
	title = rusdem.579.t
	desc = rusdem.579.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
		RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.556.aa
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 14
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}

		}

country_event = { #Restoration of republic
	id = rusdem.580
	title = rusdem.580.t
	desc = rusdem.580.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.580.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
			name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
	}

country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.581
	title = rusdem.581.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.kirillovichs
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Kirill I"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.others
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Kirill I"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vladimir III"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Anastasia I"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.581.a
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = -0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Kirill I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Vladimir III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Dmitriy III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Pavel II"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.582
					days = 15
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.583
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.582
	title = rusdem.582.t
	desc = rusdem.582.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.582.a
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = 0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.2 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = -0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = -0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = 0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.582.b
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = 0.15 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.3 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = -0.3 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = -0.3 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = 0.3 }
	}
}

		trigger = {

					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.583.d.others
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Kirill I"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vladimir III"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusdem.583.a
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = -0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = -0.03 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = -0.12 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = -0.08 }
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.585
	title = rusdem.585.t
	desc = rusdem.585.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Vsevolod I"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		years = 3
	}
	option = {
		add_stability = 0.07
		add_political_power = 50
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = 0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = 0.03 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SRD
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SRD
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = ITA
				ITA = { is_italian_federation = yes	}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ITA
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.590
	title = rusdem.590.t
	desc = rusdem.590.d
	fire_only_once = no
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = DKB
			tag = KUB
			tag = KLY
			tag = MON
			tag = TRM
		}
		is_subject = no
		RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = KUB
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = TRM
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat
						has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = MON
					MON_sternberg_in_power = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}	
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusdem.591
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}	
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.591
	title = rusdem.591.t
	desc = rusdem.591.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	option = {
		name = rusdem.591.a
		annex_country = { target = FROM }
		add_political_power = 15	
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.592
	title = rusdem.592.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.const
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Symbol_Of_Russian_Might }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.semiconst
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism }
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 50 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 50 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_total_senate_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senate_total = -50 }
		calculate_half_senate = yes
		calculate_two_thirds_senate = yes
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.f
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		set_variable = { plsr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nsp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rsdrp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { psr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { nrpr_presidential_senators = 0 }
		set_variable = { independent_presidential_senators = 0 }
		
			set_variable = { vns_presidential_senators = 33 }
			set_variable = { ep_presidential_senators = 7 }
			set_variable = { rkdp_presidential_senators = 5 }
			set_variable = { lkdp_presidential_senators = 5 }
		
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = 0 }

		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = plsr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rsdrp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = psr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = lkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = rkdp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = vns_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = ep_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nrpr_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = nsnp_final_senators }
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = independent_final_senators }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker = senate_total }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker > senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { RUS_deputy_var_checker < senate_total }
				}
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = senate_total }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { temp1 = RUS_deputy_var_checker }
				add_to_variable = { independent_total_senators = temp1 }
			}
		}
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}	
}
country_event = { #Tsar
	id = rusdem.593
	title = rusdem.593.t
	desc = rusdem.593.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PSR will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "RSDRP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PLSR and NSP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "NRPR will be banned"
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_popular_glorious_empire_tooltip
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_workers_glorious_empire_tooltip
		add_to_variable = { RUS.popular_support_monarchy = -0.25 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS.workers_support_monarchy = -0.5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
				}
				set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.595
					days = 2
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.594
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #Tsar
	id = rusdem.594
	title = rusdem.594.t
	desc = rusdem.594.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.594.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PSR will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
			}
			set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "RSDRP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PLSR and NSP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "NRPR will be banned"
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_popular_glorious_empire_tooltip
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_workers_glorious_empire_tooltip
		add_to_variable = { RUS.popular_support_monarchy = -0.25 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS.workers_support_monarchy = -0.5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.594.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}	
}
