country_event = { #Presidental check
	id = rusdem.62
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.62" }
	title = rusdem.62.t
	desc = rusdem.61.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
				has_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
				has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
				has_country_flag = RUS_SOLIDARISTS
				has_country_flag = RUS_ABAKUMOV
				has_country_flag = RUS_GORGULOV
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
				has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
				has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
				has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR
				has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_national_maximalist
				has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_empire
				has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_EUR_bolshevist
			}
		}
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
	}
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.a #appointed by government
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.63
			days = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.b #appointed by parliament
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.64
			days = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.c #appointed by population
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #plsr primaries
				id = rusdem.51
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.54
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = { #nrpr primaries/nsnp primaries
				id = rusdem.58
				days = 70
			}
			country_event = { #rovs primaries
				id = rusdem.59
				days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.50
				days = 100
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.e #appointed by senate
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_PSR_KDP_REFORM_accepted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_EMPOWER_PRESIDENT }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #plsr primaries
				id = rusdem.51
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.65
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = { #nrpr primaries/nsnp primaries
				id = rusdem.58
				days = 70
			}
			country_event = { #rovs primaries
				id = rusdem.59
				days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.66
				days = 100
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = { #RNSMA coup
	id = rusd.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.19" }
	title = rusd.19.t
	desc = rusd.19.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.19.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Vladimir Purishkevich"
				desc = "POLITICS_VLADIMIR_PURISHKEVICH_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Vladimir_Purishkevich.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = {}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_pau
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_E_Markov_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
				RUS_Nikolay_P_Vladimir_sec_pau
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.154
				days = 3
			}
			load_focus_tree = russia_focus
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kornilov coup
	id = rusd.23
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	title = rusd.24.t 
	desc = rusd.24.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		has_stability < -0.4
		date < 1936.06.06
	}
		
	option = {
		name = rusd.24.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
			RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
			RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
			RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau
		}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Lavr Kornilov"
				desc = "POLITICS_LAVR_KORNILOV_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Lavr_Kornilov.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = {}
			}
		
		
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SEN
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demonstrations
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
		remove_ideas = rus_memories_of_rev
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS
			reset_russian_leaders = yes
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.200
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Question of generals
	id = rusd.25
	title = rusd.25.t 
	desc = rusd.25.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.25.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = generals_purged
		add_manpower = -214
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_trait = hidden_sympathies
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 5
			has_country_flag = fight_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.26
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.25.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 5
			has_country_flag = appease_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		army_experience = 20
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.26
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		}
	}

		trigger = {
			rsdrp_in_power = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {

			RUS_setup_soviets = yes

					days = 1
				}
			}

				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
				}
			}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_for_rso
			RUS_Aleksandr_Shlyapnikov_eco_rso
			RUS_Mikhail_I_Kalinin_sec_rso
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.21.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			setup_soviet_russia = yes
			RUS_setup_soviets = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 10
				radical_socialist = 18
				syndicalist = 14
				social_democrat = 58
				social_liberal = 0
				market_liberal = 0
				social_conservative = 0
				authoritarian_democrat = 0
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = 0
				}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Nikitin_for_mli
			RUS_Matvey_Skobelev_eco_rso
			RUS_Fyodor_I_Dan_sec_sde
		}
	}
}	

country_event = { #Finland seizes Karelia
	id = rusd.31
	title = rusd.31.t
	desc = rusd.31.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		FIN = {
			transfer_state = 215
			transfer_state = 216
			every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 215
					state = 216
				}
			}
				remove_core_of = SOV
				remove_claim_by = FIN
				add_claim_by = SOV
				add_core_of = FIN
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.32
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.025
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of Karelia
	id = rusd.34
	title = rusd.34.t
	desc = rusd.34.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.34.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 216
					state = 215
					state = 146
				}
			}
			KAR = {
				add_state_core = PREV
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		216 = {
			add_claim_by = FIN
		}
		215 = {
			add_claim_by = FIN
		}
		146 = {
			add_claim_by = FIN
		}
		FIN = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAR
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
		}
		KAR = {
			transfer_technology = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "1930.11.9"
					election_frequency = 48
					elections_allowed = no
				}

				set_popularities = {
					totalist = 0
					radical_socialist = 6
					syndicalist = 6
					social_democrat = 0
					social_liberal = 4
					market_liberal = 0
					social_conservative = 0
					authoritarian_democrat = 56
					paternal_autocrat = 19
					national_populist = 9
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FIN = {
						OR = {
							has_government = paternal_autocrat
							has_country_flag = FIN_monarchist_victory
						}
					}
				}
				set_cosmetic_tag = KAR_FIN_mon
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Fredrik Kaarle I"
					desc = "POLITICS_FREDRIK_KAARLE_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/FIN/Portrait_FIN_Fredrik_Kaarle_I.png"
					expire = "1965.1.1"
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FIN = {
						OR = {
							has_government = paternal_autocrat
							has_country_flag = FIN_monarchist_victory
						}
					}
				}
				set_cosmetic_tag = KAR_FIN
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.34.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { # Faith and nation
	id = orth.1
	title = orth.1.t
	desc = orth.1.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = orth.1.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_CLE }
		}

				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
			}
		}

				random = 1440

		}
	}

country_event = { #Status of the Orthodox Church
	id = rusd.35
	title = rusd.35.t
	desc = rusd.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	fire_only_once = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.35"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.72
				days = 30
				random = 2160
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.35.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_liberal
			}				
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_state_religion
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.36
				days = 40
				random = 2160
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = ties_with_church
				}
				remove_ideas = ties_with_church
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_country_flag = RUS_CLE
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.37
				days = 20
				random = 960
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.38
				days = 60
				random = 1440
			}
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Motherland mass
	id = rusd.72
	title = rusd.72.t

	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.secular
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.orthodox
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.72"
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				75 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
				}
				25 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 2880
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
}

	id = rusd.74

	title = {
		text = rusd.74.t.not_monarchy

		}
	}

		trigger = {
			has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
		}
	}

			has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		}
	}

				75 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 365

					}

							id = rusd.72
							days = 365
							random = 1440
						}
					}
				}
				25 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 365
							random = 1440

		}

	id = rusd.50
	title = rusd.50.t
	desc = rusd.50.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.50.a
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_political_power = 100
		set_country_flag = RUS_dictatorship
		load_focus_tree = RUS_JUNTA_FOCUS
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.2
					days = 1
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.209
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusd.40

	desc = rusd.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.40.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		retire_country_leader = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "The Senate"
			desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long
			name = RUS_social_rev_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.39
			days = 35
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.40.b
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.39
			days = 35
		}
	}

			}

country_event = { #Kornilov's government
	id = rusd.53
	title = rusd.53.t
	desc = rusd.53.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { RUS.denikin_influence < RUS.wrangel_influence }
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
			
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { RUS.denikin_influence > RUS.wrangel_influence }
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = kornilov_stays_pm_tooltip
	}
}
country_event = { #Kornilov's Death
	id = rusd.54
	title = rusd.54.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.savinkov
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		focus_progress = {
			focus = RUS_kornilov_ruler
			progress > 0.45
		}
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_kornilov_ruler
		}
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
			has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA
		clr_country_flag = RUS_SAVI_HOG
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.61
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}

		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_Manshteyn_sec_npo
		set_country_flag = RUS_SAVI
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.35
		}
		load_focus_tree = RUS_SAVINKOV_FOCUS
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		
		set_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_ade
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_rovs_denikin
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.66
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.e
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_DEN_TEMP
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			remove_ideas = RUS_rovs_wrangel
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr Wrangel"
				desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = { RUS_black_baron }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.66
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_JUNTA }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.56.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			remove_unit_leader = 402
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			kill_ideology_leader = paternal_autocrat
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Dic_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Savinkov in power
	id = rusd.58
	title = rusd.58.t
	desc = rusd.58.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.58.a
		kill_country_leader = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			
		create_country_leader = {
		name = "Boris Savinkov"
		desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_SAVINKOV_DESC"
		picture = "Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov_Uniform.png"
		expire = "1965.1.1"
		ideology = national_populist_subtype
		traits = { vozhd }
		}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		RUS = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.61
				days = 2
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		expire = "1965.1.1"

		traits = { vozhd }
		}

			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		RUS = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
		}
		load_focus_tree = RUS_SAVINKOV_FOCUS
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Fate of Russia
	id = rusd.66
	title = rusd.66.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.67
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_DEN
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.69
			days = 2
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_country_flag = transamur_monarchy_restored }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = TRM
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_VRA
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		load_focus_tree = RUS_JUNTA_FOCUS
		add_stability = -0.075
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_sli
				RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel_Tsar.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = { RUS_black_baron }
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.4
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

	id = rusd.68
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	title = rusd.154.t
	desc = rusd.68.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.153.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_kirill = yes
			}
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 2
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusd.140.d

		name = rusd.140.a
		add_stability = 0.02

			id = rusd.141
			days = 50
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.140.b
		add_stability = -0.04
	}
}

country_event = { #Pogroms
	id = rusd.142
	title = rusd.142.t
	desc = rusd.142.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_POGROMS
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.142
				days = 60
				random = 600
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.142.a
		random_list = {
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
						add_manpower = -401
					}
					add_stability = -0.03
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -21
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -57
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -14
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -1000
					}
					add_stability = -0.05
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -327
					}
					add_stability = -0.03
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
						add_manpower = -713
					}
					add_stability = -0.04
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -608
					}
					add_stability = -0.04
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -84
					}
				}
				10 = {
					random_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							state_population > 100000
						}
					
					add_manpower = -257
					}
					add_stability = -0.01
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Thailand
	id = rusd.204
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.204" }
	title = rusd.204.t
	desc = rusd.204.d
	picture = GFX_Siam_Railway_Tourism_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = TRM
		}
		OR = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
			RUS_tsar_vladimir = yes
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			RUS_tsar_wrangel = yes
			RUS_tsar_anastasia = yes
		}
		SIA = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Prajadhipok"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Ananda Mahidol"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Bhumibol Adulyadej"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Chumbhotbongs Paribatra"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Sukhumabhinanda"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Paribatra Sukhumbhand"
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Chula Chakrabongse"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.204.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SIA
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		SIA = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Denikin-Wrangel Conflict
	id = rusd.209
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.209" }
	title = rusd.209.t
	desc = rusd.209.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_denikin
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		add_ideas = RUS_rovs_denikin
		set_variable = { var = RUS.denikin_influence value = 10 }
		set_variable = { var = RUS.wrangel_influence value = 5 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_wrangel
		add_ideas = RUS_rovs_wrangel
		set_variable = { var = RUS.denikin_influence value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = RUS.wrangel_influence value = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_savinkov
	}
}
country_event = { #Talk to royal
	id = rusd.210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.210" }
	title = rusd.210.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.210.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					check_variable = { RUS.denikin_influence > 6 }
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					check_variable = { RUS.wrangel_influence > 6 }
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					check_variable = { RUS.denikin_influence < 7 }
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					check_variable = { RUS.wrangel_influence < 7 }
				}
				random_list = {
					40 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					60 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #royal reject
	id = rusd.211
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.211" }
	title = {
		text = rusd.211.t.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.211.t.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_denikin_wrangel_choose_monarchy
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
		RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		set_country_flag = RUS_denikin_choose_republic
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		RUS_increase_denikin = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_choose_tsar
	}
}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}

		}

				has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.212.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_choose_tsar
	}
}

			}

		}
		if = {

				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 401
			}
			demote_leader = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { #Boris Romanov dies
	id = rusd.94
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Boris II"
		}
	}
	title = rusd.94.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.has_heir
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.no_heir
		trigger = {
			NOT = {	has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession }
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.95"
		set_country_flag = Boris_Romanov_dead
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.94.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.94.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = rusd.95

	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.95"
		set_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
					RUS_tsar_kirill = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusd.103

	title = {
		text = rusd.103.t.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.103.t.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.103"
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_ade
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_carm_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_carm_ade
			add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_carm_ade
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.103.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_setup_tsar_pavel = yes
		add_stability = -0.12
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.100.с
		trigger = {
			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			kill_country_leader = yes
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			RUS_setup_acting_president = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.103.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = no
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.108
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.108" }
	title = rusd.108.t
	desc = rusd.108.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

country_event = {
	id = rusd.110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.110" }
	title = rusd.110.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d.chairman
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			tag = SOV
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d.president
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			tag = RUS
		}
	}
	

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.110.a
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_sec_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_I_Kalinin_sec_rso  
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				}
				tag = RUS
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				kill_country_leader = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				get_current_government_type = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
				kill_country_leader = yes
				restore_previous_government_type = yes
				RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				}
				tag = SOV
			}
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andrei Zhdanov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Andrei_Zhdanov.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
		}				
	}
}

country_event = { #1st Women's Division of Death
	id = rusd.128
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.128" }
	title = rusd.128.t
	desc = rusd.128.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		controls_state = 219
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_REVOL
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.a #Allow it
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_WOMAN_DIVISION_tt
		hidden_effect = { load_oob = RUS_WOMAN_DIVISION }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.b #no
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Wrangel dead
	id = rusd.130
	title = rusd.130.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.130.d.wrangeltsar
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
		}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.130.d.wrangelpm
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel_son = yes
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_ade
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_ade
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.130.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Pyotr IV"
			}
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_setup_shatilov = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_ade
					has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_sec_ade
				}
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Shatilov_hog_npo
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Viktor_L_Pokrovskiy_sec_npo 
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.156
	title = rusd.156.t
	desc = rusd.156.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.156.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_DMITRIY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_monarchy
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_republican_sympathies
			value = -2
		}
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
			value = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.156.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_monarchy
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_republican_sympathies
			value = 2
		}
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
			value = -2
		}
	}
}

				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_monarchy
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_republican_sympathies
			value = -2
		}
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
			value = 2
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.160
	title = rusd.160.t
	desc = rusd.160.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = {
			flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
			value > 1
		}
		focus_progress = {
			focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
			progress > 0
		}
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.160.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rigged_for_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.160.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rigged_for_republic
		set_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.160.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.162
	title = rusd.162.t
	desc = rusd.162.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.162.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_referendum_is_rigged
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
						value > 4
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_monarchy_guaranteed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
				}
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
						value < -4
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republic_guaranteed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = {
					flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
					value > 2
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_monarchy_likely
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = {
					flag = RUS_monarchy_sympathies
					value < -1
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republic_likely
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.163
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = rusd.163
	title = rusd.163.t
	desc = rusd.163.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.163.a #Republicans
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
						has_country_flag = {
							flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
							value > 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 0
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > -2
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -1
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > -3
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -2
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > -4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -3
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > -5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -4
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > -6
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusd.164 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.163.b #Monarchists
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
						has_country_flag = {
							flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
							value < -5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 0
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 2
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 1
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 3
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 2
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 3
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.0
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 4
					}
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < 6
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusd.165 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.165
	title = rusd.165.t
	desc = rusd.165.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_DMITRIY
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchists_win_referendum
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
				}
				country_event = { id = rusd.166 days = 3 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.153
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchists_win_referendum
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
			set_country_flag = rus_absolute_monarchy
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
				}
				country_event = { id = rusd.166 days = 3 }
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.154
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

	id = rusd.166
	title = rusd.166.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.166.d.monarchist
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_monarchists_win_referendum
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.166.d.republican
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_republicans_win_referendum
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.166.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 2
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 3
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value > 5
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -2
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = gre_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -3
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
					has_country_flag = {
						flag = RUS_monarchist_sympathies
						value < -5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = rus_republic_rig }
				country_event = { id = rusd.19 hours = 3 }
				else = {
					country_event = { id = rusd.30 hours = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.166.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_KIRILL
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_TSAR_DMITRIY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_rig
			}
			add_political_power = -100
			add_stability = -0.05		
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = rus_absolute_monarchy
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusd.154
						days = 2
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusd.153
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Choosing Tsar - CM
	id = rusd.153
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_russian_monarch = yes
			RUS_setup_monarch_variables = yes
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = DKB
						tag = KUB
						tag = KLY
						tag = MON
						tag = TRM
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.590
					days = 14
					random_days = 15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusd.153.t 
	desc = rusd.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.153.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}			
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Choosing Tsar - AM
	id = rusd.154
	title = rusd.154.t 
	desc = rusd.154.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 1
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
				has_country_flag = Russia_Unites_With_Transamur
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_kirill = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Diterikhs_PM }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.1541
					days = 1
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.165.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		clr_country_flag = RUS_democracy
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_anastasia = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1956
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 1
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {

					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.8
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}

		name = russia.1956.a

			ideology = paternal_autocrat

			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes

			country_event = {
				id = rusd.35
				days = 4
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.9
					days = 7
				}
			}			
		}
	}

country_event = { #Choosing PM - Absolutism
	id = rusd.1541
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_all_ministers = yes }
	}
	title = rusd.1541.t
	desc = rusd.1541.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusd.1541.a

			factor = 25
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_pau
		set_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no

		}

country_event = { #Size of funds discussion
	id = rusd.172
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.172" }
	title = rusd.172.t
	desc = rusd.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.172.a
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.b
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.c
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 1
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
}
