				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.military_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}

	### Effects

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_pick_zemstvo_states = yes }
	}

	#SOCIAL
	option = { #new hospitals
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #new schools
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
		add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #housing programme
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed civil investments
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -1 }
			add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#INDUSTRY
	option = { #industrial expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #production increase
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #infrastructure expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #agricultural development
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #refinery built
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = synthetic_refinery
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed industrial investment
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 120
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 60
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#RESEARCH 

	option = { #industrial research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research breakthrough
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research setback
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research breakthrough
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research setback
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Anniversary
	id = rusd.180
	picture = GFX_rus_day_after
	title = rusd.180.t
	desc = rusd.180.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			has_democratic_government = yes
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.180.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.180
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
###Socialist events
country_event = { #Unlock political decisions
	id = russoc.1
	picture = GFX_rus_commie_event
	title = russoc.1.t
	desc = {
		text = russoc.1.d.popular
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.1.d.zhukov
		trigger = {
			has_government = totalist
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {#Popular Front decision
		name = russoc.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TRADEUNIONISTS
					}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = totalist }
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_congress_tt
		set_country_flag = unlock_congress_sov
	}
	
	option = {#Zhukov rules alone
		name = russoc.1.b
		trigger = {
			has_government = totalist
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.50
			days = 2
		}
	}
	
	option = {#Zhukov invites bolsheviks
		name = russoc.1.c
		trigger = {
			has_government = totalist
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
					}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MAYAKOVSKY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_GASTEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_LUNACHARSKY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZINOVIEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_KAMENEV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_SOKOLNIKOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_CHICHERIN
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MOLOTOV
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_YAGODA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_KAGANOVICH
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_YEZHOV
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = SOV_totalist_party
			long_name = SOV_totalist_party_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Grigory Zinoviev"
			desc = "POLITICS_GRIGORY_ZINOVIEV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Grigoriy_Zinoviev.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = totalist_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
			SOV_Lev_Kamenev_for_tot
			RUS_Evgeniy_A_Preobrazhenskiy_eco_tot
			SOV_Genrikh_Yagoda_sec_tot
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Bolsheviks_In_Power
		set_country_flag = zhukov_invites_bolsheviks
	}
	
}
country_event = { #Socialist congress
	id = russoc.2
	immediate = {
		setup_soviet_congress = yes
	}			
	title = russoc.2.t
	desc = russoc.2.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.2.a
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.4
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.3
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Question of Bolsheviks
	id = russoc.3
	title = russoc.3.t
	desc = russoc.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = congress_bolsheviks_allowed
		increase_bolsheviks_congress = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Lev Kamenev"
			desc = "POLITICS_LEV_KAMENEV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Lev_Kamenev.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = totalist_subtype
			traits = {}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.6
			days = 10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.3.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.6
			days = 10
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Question of Mensheviks
	id = russoc.4
	title = russoc.4.t
	desc = russoc.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.4.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		increase_mensheviks_congress = yes
		set_country_flag = popular_front_coalition
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.025
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.3
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.4.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.3
			days = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Economy
	id = russoc.5
	title = russoc.5.t
	desc = russoc.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = congress_bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			increase_bolsheviks_congress = yes
		}
		
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.10
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TRADEUNIONISTS
				}
			}			
		}
		increase_profsoyuz_congress = yes
		increase_plsr_congress = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.10
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.5.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP
					}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR
				}
			}
		}
		increase_psr_congress = yes
		increase_nsp_congress = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = popular_front_coalition
			}
			increase_mensheviks_congress = yes
		}
		modify_country_flag = {
			flag = nsp_value
			value = 1
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.10
			days = 5
		}
	}
}

						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS

						rule = SOV_path

					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = congress_bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			increase_bolsheviks_congress = yes
		}
		increase_nsp_congress = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = popular_front_coalition
			}
			increase_mensheviks_congress = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			increase_profsoyuz_congress = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_red_army_congress
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.13
			days = 5
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.8
			days = 10
		}
	}

			}
		}

country_event = {#Results
	id = russoc.12
	immediate = {
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = soviet_congress_end
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_ongoing
	}
	title = russoc.12.t
	desc = russoc.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS
					}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { bolshevik_value > vkps_value }
			check_variable = { bolshevik_value > profsoyuz_value }
			check_variable = { bolshevik_value > psr_value }
			check_variable = { bolshevik_value > nsp_value }
			check_variable = { bolshevik_value > menshevik_value }
		}
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_victorous
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Lev_Kamenev_hog_tot
			SOV_Vyacheslav_Molotov_for_tot
			RUS_Evgeniy_A_Preobrazhenskiy_eco_tot
			SOV_Genrikh_Yagoda_sec_tot
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Bolsheviks_In_Power				
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR
					}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { vkps_value > bolshevik_value }
			check_variable = { vkps_value > psr_value }
			check_variable = { vkps_value > nsp_value }
			check_variable = { vkps_value > menshevik_value }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_flag = vkps_victorous
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_rso
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Ustinov_for_syn
			RUS_Sergey_P_Medvedev_eco_syn
			RUS_Yuri_Lutovinov_sec_syn
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
			factor = 10000
			has_game_rule = {
						rule = SOV_path
						option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR
					}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { psr_value > bolshevik_value }
			check_variable = { psr_value > profsoyuz_value }
			check_variable = { psr_value > vkps_value }
			check_variable = { psr_value > nsp_value }
			check_variable = { psr_value > menshevik_value }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
			name = RUS_social_liberal_party
		}

		set_country_flag = psr_victorous

			RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_I_Ivanov_eco_rso
			RUS_Kost_S_Burevoy_sec_rso
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_psr
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Vladimir Volsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_VOLSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Vladimir_Volsky.png"

		}

			check_variable = { profsoyuz_value > nsp_value }
			check_variable = { profsoyuz_value > menshevik_value }

		}
		add_ideas = {
			SOV_Aleksandr_Shlyapnikov_hog_rso
			RUS_Aleksandra_M_Kollontai_for_tot
			RUS_Sergey_P_Medvedev_eco_syn
			RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_sec_rso
		}
	}

}
country_event = { #Famine
	id = russoc.22
	title = russoc.22.t
	desc = russoc.22.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.22.a
		remove_ideas = rus_prodrazvyorstka
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_famine
			days = 365
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Troika
	id = russoc.50
	title = russoc.50.t
	desc = russoc.50.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.50.a
		set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		set_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 40
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Tukha_Influence
			value = 25
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Frunze_Influence
			value = 30
		}
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = SOV_Troika
		activate_mission = SOV_power_struggle_ends
		activate_mission = SOV_get_bolsheviks_on_our_side
		activate_mission = SOV_get_plsr_on_our_side
		activate_mission = SOV_get_voroshilov
	}
}

country_event = { #Zinoviev
	id = russoc.54
	title = russoc.54.t
	desc = russoc.54.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.54.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					0 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55
							days = 2
						}
					}
					80 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.56
							days = 2
						}
					}
					20 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.57
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_tukha
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					80 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55
							days = 2
						}
					}
					0 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.56
							days = 2
						}
					}
					20 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.57
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_frunze
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55
							days = 2
						}
					}
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.56
							days = 2
						}
					}
					0 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.57
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_list = {
				55 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.55
						days = 2
					}
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.56
						days = 2
					}
				}
				25 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.57
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.54.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_zinoviev_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					0 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.55
							days = 2
						}
					}
					80 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.56
							days = 2
						}
					}
					20 = {
						country_event = {
							id = russoc.57
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

					20 = {

						}
					}
				}

country_event = { #Zinoviev support zhukov
	id = russoc.55
	title = russoc.55.t
	desc = russoc.55.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.55.a
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
		set_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
		add_to_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 25
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #voroshilov
	id = russoc.58
	title = russoc.58.t
	desc = russoc.58.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.58.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_voroshilov_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.60
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_frunze
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_voroshilov_plsr_is_not_guaranteed
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.59
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.59
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.60
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.59
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
			}

					id = russoc.59
					days = 5
				}

		}
		else = {

					id = russoc.59
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.58.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov

			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_voroshilov_plsr_is_not_guaranteed

country_event = { #voroshilov support zhukov
	id = russoc.59
	title = russoc.59.t
	desc = russoc.59.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.59.a
		set_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_zhukov
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 605
			}
			promote_leader = yes
			add_skill_level = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 25
		}		
	}	
}

					}

country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.62
	title = russoc.62.t
	desc = russoc.62.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.62.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_zhukov }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.63
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.62.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_frunze }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.64
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.62.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.65
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.63
	title = russoc.63.t
	desc = russoc.63.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.63.a
		kill_country_leader = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Georgiy_K_Zhukov_hog_tot
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_K_Zhukov_hog_tot
		}
		set_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 457 }
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					Tukha_Influence > Frunze_Influence
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = { red_napoleon }
			}
		}
		else = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Frunze"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Frunze.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = totalist_subtype
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

	title = russoc.64.t

		}
		set_variable = {
			var = Frunze_Influence
			value = 0
		}

	}
}

country_event = { #voroshilov plot
	id = russoc.67
	title = russoc.66.t
	desc = russoc.67.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.67.a
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 605 }
			retire = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = voroshilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_frunze
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = Frunze_Influence
				value = 25
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = voroshilov_supported_zhukov
			}
			subtract_from_variable = {
				var = Zhukov_Influence
				value = 25
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #plsr support
	id = russoc.68
	title = russoc.68.t
	desc = russoc.68.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.68.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = completely_ind_tu
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_zhukov
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
					}					
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_frunze
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.71
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
						NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_zhukov
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.69
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead
						has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.70
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = plsr_will_support_tukha
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.70
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}

country_event = { #plsr support
	id = russoc.69
	title = russoc.69.t
	desc = russoc.69.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.69.a
		set_country_flag = plsr_support_zhukov
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = tu_with_limited_state_control
			}
			add_ideas = trade_unions_4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = state_controlled_tu
			}
			add_ideas = trade_unions_1
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = trade_unions_3
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = Zhukov_Influence
			value = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Troika dissolves
	id = russoc.85
	immediate = { set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_dissolved }
	title = russoc.85.t
	desc = russoc.85.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.a
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Zhukov_Influence
					value = Tukha_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Zhukov_Influence
					value = Frunze_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead }
			}
		}			
		set_country_flag = zhukov_rules_alone
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = RUS_red_army_party_long
			name = RUS_red_army_party
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.b
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Tukha_Influence
					value = Zhukov_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Tukha_Influence
					value = Frunze_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_dead }
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = totalist_subtype
			traits = { red_napoleon }
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_country_flag = tukhachevsky_power
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = SOV_tukh_party_long
			name = SOV_tukh_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_tukha
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.85.c
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = {
					var = Frunze_Influence
					value = Tukha_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				check_variable = {
					var = Frunze_Influence
					value = Zhukov_Influence
					compare = greater_than
				}
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Mikhail_Frunze_dead }
			}
		}			
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Frunze"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Frunze.png"
			expire = "1965.1.1"
			ideology = totalist_subtype
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_country_flag = tukhachevsky_power
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = SOV_frunze_party_long
			name = SOV_frunze_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = zinoviev_supported_frunze
			}
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_hog_tot
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
	}
}

country_event = { #Socialist Victory in the Civil War (GER)
	id = russoc.103
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.103 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.103.t
	desc = russoc.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
    fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = GER
		country_exists = SOV
		SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.103.a #Offer protection to all threatened nations
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = POL
					tag = FIN
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = GEO
				}
				at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = {
					has_government = national_populist
					POL_zegota_in_power = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.119
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.103.b #We don't fear the Russians
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = -50
	}
}

country_event = { # An Invitation to the Internationale
	id = russoc.115
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.115" }
	title = russoc.115.t
	
	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.guaranteed
		trigger = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.invited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.115.a #Yes, let's join forces
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			}
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = russoc.116 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.115.b #We shouldn't provoke Germany...
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.117 }
	}
}

country_event = { # FROM Refuses Protection
	id = russoc.117
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.117" }
	title = russoc.117.t
	desc = russoc.117.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.117.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #German Protection? (POL/FIN/DKB/GEO/AZE/KUB/MTR/KLY)
	id = russoc.119
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.119 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.119.t
	desc = russoc.119.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = FIN
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = KLY
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.120
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.b #Ask for a guarantee only
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				tag = MTR
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
		}
		GER = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.c #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM accepts
	id = russoc.120
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.120 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.120.t
	desc = russoc.120.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.120.a
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
}

### Don-Kuban seizes Astrakhan ###
country_event = {
	id = rusfor.998
	title = rusfor.998.t
	desc = rusfor.998.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.998.a
		ALO = {
			transfer_state = 236
			236 = {
				add_claim_by = SOV
				add_core_of = ALO
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Autonomy for Don/Kuban
	id = rusfor.101
	title = rusfor.101.t
	desc = rusfor.101.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.101.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.102
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.101.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.103
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Autonomy for Don/Kuban
	id = rusfor.102
	title = rusfor.102.t
	desc = rusfor.102.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.102.a
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tag = DKB
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = DKB_Novorussia_RUS
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = authoritarian_democrat
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = KUB_RUS
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = social_conservative
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_conservative
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Autonomy for Don/Kuban
	id = rusfor.103
	title = rusfor.103.t
	desc = rusfor.103.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.103.a
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}



country_event = { #Battle for Astrakhan
	id = rusfor.104
	title = rusfor.104.t
	desc = rusfor.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.104.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			KLY = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.105
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		start_border_war = {
			change_state_after_war = no
			attacker = {
				state = 236
				num_provinces = 4
				on_win = rusfor.106
				on_lose = rusfor.107
				on_cancel = rusfor.108
			}
				
			defender = {
				state = 1191
				num_provinces = 4
				on_win = rusfor.106
				on_lose = rusfor.107
				on_cancel = rusfor.108
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_border_war_data = {
				attacker = 236
				defender = 1101
				defender_modifier = 0.5
				combat_width = 100
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.104.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}

country_event = { #Battle for Astrakhan
	id = rusfor.106
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				RUS = {
					transfer_state = 1191
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.106.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.106.d.rus
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.106.d.kly
		trigger = {
			tag = KLY
		}
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.a
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		KLY = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1289
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.b
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_stability = 0.07
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.106.c
		trigger = {
			tag = KLY
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
	}
}

### FOREIGN POLICY ###
country_event = { #Germany's Reaction on Russian plans in Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1000" }
	title = rusfor.1000.t
	desc = rusfor.1000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.a #Demand that Russia respects the Brest-Litovsk treaty!
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1005
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.b #Threaten Russia and invite the endangered nations into the Völkerbund!
		trigger = {
			country_exists = DKB
			country_exists = KUB
			OR = {
				is_neighbor_of = DKB
				any_allied_country = {
					is_neighbor_of = DKB
				}
				is_neighbor_of = KUB
				any_allied_country = {
					is_neighbor_of = KUB
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			country_exists = KUB
			
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			DKB = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1001
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			KUB = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1001
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1005
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.c #We don't care about the Caucasus.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_global_flag = dkb_dissolved
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #alliance name
	id = rusfor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1" }
	title = rusfor.1.t
	desc = rusfor.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.a
		trigger = {
			has_democratic_government = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = russian_cis
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = russian_cis
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				has_country_flag = authoritarian_democrat_coalition
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = eurasian_bloc
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = eurasian_bloc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = moscow_accord
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = moscow_accord
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
			}
			set_faction_name = fourth_internationale
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = fourth_internationale
		}
	}
}
	
	
country_event = { #Security of the Eastern border OTT
	id = rusfor.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.2" }
	title = rusfor.2.t
	desc = rusfor.2.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = OTT
		is_subject = no
		has_war = no
		RUS = { is_subject = no }
		OR = {
			231 = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = RUS
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = rus_negotiations
		}	
		country_exists = EGY
		NOT = {
			is_in_faction_with = EGY
			has_subject = EGY
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.a #Send the Prince!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.3
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.b #No deals with the Russians!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = 20
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.3.d

		name = rusfor.3.a #ok sign it

			factor = 40
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.4
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.3.b #Include armenia in deal
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_subject = ARM }
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		OTT = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.5
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.3.c #No
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia wants armenia
	id = rusfor.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.5" }
	title = rusfor.5.t
	desc = rusfor.5.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.a #abandon armenia
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		ARM = {
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_ideas = arm_ottoman_occupation
			hidden_effect = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0
				}
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ARM
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.6
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.b #we won't give up on armenia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #The Crimea
	id = rusfor.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.7" }
	title = rusfor.7.t
	desc = rusfor.7.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_subject = no
		date > 1938.01.01
		UKR = {
			owns_state = 137
			controls_state = 137
			OR = {
				is_in_faction_with = ROOT
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.7.a #Try to lease the Crimea.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		add_state_claim = 137
		add_state_claim = 1220
		add_state_claim = 1221
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.8
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.7.b #Leave the Crimea for the Ukraine.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia asks to lease the Crimea
	id = rusfor.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.8" }
	title = rusfor.8.t
	desc = rusfor.8.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.8.a #Give the Crimea to the Russians.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 137 }
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 1220 }
			effect_tooltip = { transfer_state = 1221 }
			send_equipment = {
				target = ROOT
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 2000
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.9
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.8.b #No, the Crimea is Ukrainian now!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		trigger = {
			is_subject = no
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Ukraine leases us the Crimea!
	id = rusfor.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.9" }
	title = rusfor.9.t
	desc = rusfor.9.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.9.a
		add_political_power = 50
		transfer_state = 137
	}
}

country_event = { #The Ukrainians refuse to lease the Crimea!
	id = rusfor.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.10" }
	title = rusfor.10.t
	desc = rusfor.10.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.a #Renounce the claim.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		remove_state_claim = 137
		remove_state_claim = 1220
		remove_state_claim = 1221
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.b #They had better control the Black Sea well for us.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10.c #Ungrateful Ukrainians! This means war!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { leave_faction = yes }
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 130 #Western Ukraine
					region = 165 #Eastern Ukraine
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = no
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Invitations
	id = rusfor.11
	title = rusfor.11.t
	desc = rusfor.11.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				is_subject_of = RUS
			}			
		}
		set_country_flag = psc_council_vote
		add_to_array = { global.PSC_voters = ROOT }
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.12
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.13
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.18
	title = rusfor.18.t
	desc = rusfor.18.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.18.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.27
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.18.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.27
			days = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PS - Voting
	id = rusfor.26
	title = rusfor.26.t
	desc = rusfor.26.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.26.a
	}
}
	
	
country_event = { #PS - Czechoslovakia Result
	id = rusfor.27
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.27" }
	title = rusfor.27.t
	desc = rusfor.27.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
			set_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
			set_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_independent
		clr_global_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_separate_independent
		set_country_flag = PSC_czechoslovakia_denied
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.19
	title = rusfor.19.t
	desc = rusfor.19.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		OR = {
			CRO = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			MNT = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			AUS = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			HUN = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {

			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.28
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.28
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.19.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_illyria_slovenia_croatia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.28
			days = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PS - Illyria Result
	id = rusfor.28
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.28" }
	title = rusfor.28.t
	desc = rusfor.28.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
			set_country_flag = illyria_independent_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
			set_country_flag = illyria_separate_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_illyria_slovenia_croatia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_slovenia_croatia
			set_country_flag = illyria_slovenia_croatia_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_independent
		clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_separate_independent
		clr_global_flag = PSC_illyria_slovenia_croatia
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PS - Vojvodina Result
	id = rusfor.29
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.29" }
	title = rusfor.29.t
	desc = rusfor.29.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_croatia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_croatia
			set_country_flag = vojvodina_croatia_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_serbia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_serbia
			set_country_flag = vojvodina_serbia_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_serbia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_vojvodina_croatia
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.27.a

		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_yugoslavia
		set_country_flag = yugoslavia_approved
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_yugoslavia
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Panslavic Congress - Galicia
	id = rusfor.22
	title = rusfor.22.t
	desc = rusfor.22.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			RUS = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			OR = {
				UKR = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				GAL = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				POL = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
				AUS = {
					has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.a
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			country_exists = UKR
			UKR = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
			POL = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}		
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.b
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
			POL = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}		
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {country_exists = POL }
			10 = {
				owner = {
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { country_exists = UKR }
			
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.22.f
		trigger = {
			country_exists = POL
			POL = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
			country_exists = UKR
			UKR = {
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		activate_mission = PSC_vote_timer
		set_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
		set_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				country_event = rusfor.26
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.31
			days = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PS - Galicia Result
	id = rusfor.31
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.31" }
	title = rusfor.31.t
	desc = rusfor.31.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
			set_country_flag = galicia_split_ukraine_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
			set_country_flag = galicia_split_russia_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
			set_country_flag = galicia_annex_russia_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
			set_country_flag = eastgalicia_split_approved
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
			}
			clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
			set_country_flag = eastgalicia_ukraine_approved
		}
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {	#Denied!
		name = rusfor.27.b
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes
		clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_ukraine
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_ukraine
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_split_russia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_galicia_annex_russia
		clr_global_flag = PSC_eastgalicia_split
		clr_global_flag = psc_vote_ongoing
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = global.PSC_voters
			THIS = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
					}
					clr_country_flag = PSC_we_voted_this_time
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = { global.psc_yes_votes > global.psc_no_votes }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PS - Carpathian Rus Result
	id = rusfor.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.33" }
	title = rusfor.33.t
	desc = rusfor.33.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {	#Approved!
		name = rusfor.27.a
		clear_variable = global.psc_yes_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_no_votes
		clear_variable = global.psc_abstain_votes

			limit = {
				has_global_flag = PSC_zakarpatie_cze
			}

			}
