country_event = { #Status of Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.1304
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1304" }
	title = rusfor.1304.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.czechoslovakia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.slovakia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1309
				days = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { country_exists = SVK }
					HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { country_exists = SVK }
					HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}
			set_country_flag = austria_refuse_to_release_czechs
		}
		
	}
}
country_event = { #Free Czechoslovakia
	id = rusfor.1305
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1305" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
						}
					}
					kill_country_leader = yes
				}
			set_cosmetic_tag = CZE_czechoslavakia
			
			leave_faction = yes
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = CZE
				}
					CZE = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_country_leader = {
									name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
							}
						}
						kill_country_leader = yes
					}
				
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SVK = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = SVK
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
				SVK = { 
					leave_faction = yes
					separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SVK = { NOT = { owns_state = 664 } }
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = 664
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				AUS = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HUN = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved }
			}
			CZE = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_slo_approved }
			}
			SVK = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
	}
}	
country_event = { #Austria tries to release our territory
	id = rusfor.1306
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1306" }
	title = rusfor.1306.t
	desc = rusfor.1306.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1306.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1306.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 73 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 70 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 875 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		AUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1307
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		HUN = { add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = AUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1305
					days = 1
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1308
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	} 
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1307.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}
			set_country_flag = austria_refuse_to_release_czechs
		}
	}
}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 73 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 70 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { owns_state = 875 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			AUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = HUN
					autonomy_state = autonomy_free
				}
			}
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			leave_faction = yes
			load_oob = HUN_AUS_Civil_war
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "Ten new militia divisions will be formed"
		declare_war_on = {
			target = AUS
			type = annex_everything
		}
		country_event = kr.hungary.2
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1308.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Russia agrees
	id = rusfor.1310
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1310" }
	title = rusfor.1310.t
	desc = rusfor.1310.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1310.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			HUN = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = SVK
						is_core_of = CZE
					}
				}
				CZE = {
					transfer_state = PREV
					add_state_core = PREV
				}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
								ruling_only = yes
							}
						has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
						}
					}
					kill_country_leader = yes
				}
			set_cosmetic_tag = CZE_czechoslavakia
			
			leave_faction = yes
			separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = czechoslovakia_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CZE = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CZE
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = CZE
				}
					CZE = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			CZE = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_country_leader = {
									name = "Johann II zu Schwarzenberg"
									ruling_only = yes
								}
							has_country_flag = CZE_SVK_was_puppeted
							}
						}
						kill_country_leader = yes
					}
				
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SVK = { is_subject_of = AUS }
				}
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = SVK
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						SVK = {
							NOT = { 
							owns_state = 1122
							owns_state = 1136
							}
						} 
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = 1122
						transfer_state = 1136
					}
				}
				SVK = { 
					leave_faction = yes
					separate_peace_all_wars = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				AUS = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
				HUN = {
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							is_core_of = SVK
						}
					}
					SVK = {
						transfer_state = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved }
			}
			CZE = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_slo_approved }
			}
			SVK = {
				transfer_state = 73
				transfer_state = 1119
				add_state_core = 73
				add_state_core = 1119
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 69
		transfer_state = 71
		transfer_state = 74
		transfer_state = 786
		transfer_state = 1133
		transfer_state = 1138
		transfer_state = 1139
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = CZE
			relation = military_access
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1311
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1311" }

	desc = rusfor.1311.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.1311.a

		}

			}

						target = SVK

					}

						}
					}
					SVK = {

					}
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_cze_approved }
			}
			CZE = {
				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73

			}
			SVK = {
				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}
		add_state_core = 69
		add_state_core = 74
		add_state_core = 786
		
	}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote } }
			}
		}
		AUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1317
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}			
country_event = { #Free Illyria
	id = rusfor.1315
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1315" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_independent_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
							is_core_of = SLO
							is_core_of = BOS
							is_core_of = MNT
						}
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = { 
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_slovenia_croatia_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
							is_core_of = BOS
						}
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101
							state = 1103
							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}
					SLO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = { 
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = illyria_separate_approved }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { CRO = { is_subject_of = AUS } }
				AUS = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = CRO
						autonomous_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = CRO
					}
					CRO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101
							state = 1103
							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}
					SLO = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
			CRO = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 104
					}
					BOS = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = CRO
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 105
					}
					MNT = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = CRO
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				separate_peace_all_wars = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_croatia_approved }
			}
			CRO = {
				transfer_state = 45
				add_state_core = 73
				transfer_state = 45
				add_state_core = 875
			}
		}
	}

	id = rusfor.1318
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1318" }
	title = rusfor.1318.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1318.d.serbia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_serbia_approved }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1318.d.croatia
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = vojvodina_croatia_approved }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1319
						days = 5
					}
				}
		if = {
			limit = {
				HUN = { is_subject_of = AUS }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				HUN = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1306
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Release Galicia
	id = rusfor.1321
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1321" }
	title = rusfor.1305.t
	desc = rusfor.1305.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_split_ukraine_approved }
			}
			10 = {
				owner = { 
					transfer_state = 88
					transfer_state = 1124
					transfer_state = 1125
					add_state_core = 88
					add_state_core = 1124
					add_state_core = 1125
				}
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
				add_state_core = 89
				add_state_core = 91
				add_state_core = 1126
				add_state_core = 1127
				add_state_core = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_split_russia_approved }
			}
			10 = {
				owner = { 
					transfer_state = 88
					transfer_state = 1124
					transfer_state = 1125
					add_state_core = 88
					add_state_core = 1124
					add_state_core = 1125
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = galicia_annex_russia_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 88
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1124
				transfer_state = 1125
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = eastgalicia_split_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = eastgalicia_ukraine_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 89
				transfer_state = 91
				transfer_state = 1126
				transfer_state = 1127
				transfer_state = 1140
				add_state_core = 89
				add_state_core = 91
				add_state_core = 1126
				add_state_core = 1127
				add_state_core = 1140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_annex_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 80
				transfer_state = 713
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_split_russia_approved }
			}
			RUS = {
				transfer_state = 80
			}
			46 = {
					owner = { transfer_state = 713 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = bukowina_split_ukraine_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 80
				add_state_core = 80
			}
			46 = {
					owner = { transfer_state = 713 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_ukr_approved }
			}
			UKR = {
				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = zakarpatie_rus_approved }
			}

				transfer_state = 73
				add_state_core = 73
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		trigger = {
			tag = AUS
		}
		ai_chance = {

			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}

				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1325
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = psc_council_vote
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = { tag = CRO }

					id = rusfor.1322

					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1312
					days = 1
				}
				set_country_flag = austria_refuse_to_release_croats
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1304.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psc_council_vote }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1323
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia agrees
	id = rusfor.1326
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1326" }
	title = rusfor.1310.t
	desc = rusfor.1326.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1326.a
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = CRO }
			SER = { 
				annex_country = {
					target = CRO
					transfer_troops = yes
				} 
			}
		}
		else = {
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
						}
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						state = 102
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1327
	title = rusfor.1317.t
	desc = rusfor.1327.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1317.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70 
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = CRO }
			SER = {
				annex_country = {
					target = CRO
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			AUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = CRO
						}
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
					remove_core_of = AUS
				}
			}
		AUS = {
			every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 102
							state = 1101
							state = 1103
							state = 1104
							state = 736
							state = 1100
							state = 1144
						}
					}
					SER = {
						transfer_state = PREV
						add_state_core = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}

				id = rusfor.1312
				days = 1
			}

		}
	}

country_event = { #Great Patriotic War
	id = rusfor.47
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.47" }
	title = rusfor.47.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_GER
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_GER
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = FRA
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		NOT = { country_exists = SOV }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.a #We will march through Avenue des Champs-Elysées!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.b #We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}
}

	title = {

				controls_state = 255
			}
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.51.t.1328
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 205
				controls_state = 242
				controls_state = 246
			}
		}
	}
	desc = rusfor.51.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 3391
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 6414
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3

			}

country_event = { #Russia offers us an alliance
	id = rusfor.52
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.52" }
	title = rusfor.52.t
	desc = rusfor.52.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = LAT_FORPOL
					option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { gives_military_access_to = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { gives_military_access_to = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
			#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject = no
						NOT = {
							tag = ITA
						}
					}
					remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
					#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.54
						days = 3
						random = 72
					}
				}
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_allied_@ROOT
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.53
					days = 3
					random = 72
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = LAT_FORPOL
					option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = EST_FORPOL
						option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.58 days = 1 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = no }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.53
					days = 3
					random = 72
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Country responds
	id = rusfor.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.53" }

	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = rusfor.58
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.58 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.58.t
	desc = rusfor.58.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.59 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.60 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = rusfor.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.59 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.59.t
	desc = rusfor.59.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.59.a
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
					remove_claim_by = FROM
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
				remove_claim_by = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany invites DKB/GEO/AZE to the Reichspakt
	id = rusfor.1001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1001" }
	title = rusfor.1001.t
	desc = rusfor.1001.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.a #Accept
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				don_is_pro_russian = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				kuban_is_pro_russian = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1002
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = DKB }
				every_country = { #GEO & AZR
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = KUB
							tag = DKB
							tag = KLY
							tag = MTR
							tag = GEO
							tag = AZE
						}
						NOT = { tag = ROOT }
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1001
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.b #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia ignored demands
	id = rusfor.1006
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1006" }
	title = rusfor.1006.t
	desc = rusfor.1006.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.a #Cease all contacts between the Völkerbund and Russia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = FROM
			}
			remove_from_faction = FROM
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1007
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.c #Back down, we cannot afford a conflict with Russia.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		trigger = {
			country_exists = FRA
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			tag = RUS

	}

	}

				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia wants to seize us! DKB
	id = rusfor.1011
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1011" }
	title = rusfor.1011.t
	desc = rusfor.1011.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1011.a #strike
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_neighbor_of = SOV
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = SOV
				type = annex_everything
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = rusfor.1012
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_neighbor_of = RUS
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = rusfor.1012
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1011.b #surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_neighbor_of = SOV
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1013
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_neighbor_of = RUS
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1013
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

					target = AZE

				}
			}

			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3

				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}

		}
		add_political_power = 100
		FROM = {

			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.10251.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = 0.08
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1026.b #Never
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1028
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #GER Russia demands concessions in the Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1048
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1048" }
	title = rusfor.1048.t
	desc = rusfor.1048.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		FROM = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = PREV
					autonomy_state = autonomy_free
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
			leave_faction = yes
			country_event = rusfor.1050
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1053
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1054
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1049
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans refused our demands
	id = rusfor.1049
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1049" }
	title = rusfor.1049.t
	desc = rusfor.1049.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.a #Declare war upon the Völkerbund!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = DKB
					is_in_faction_with = GEO
					is_in_faction_with = AZE
					is_in_faction_with = ARM
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.b #Ignore german guarantees
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = DKB
					is_in_faction_with = GEO
					is_in_faction_with = AZE
					is_in_faction_with = ARM
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							region = 134 #Caucasus
							region = 135 #Kuban
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = no
					}
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = military_access
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.1065.a #Alliance
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.b #Northern Iran and alliance
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.c #Puppet
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.e #Northern Iran and puppet
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia demands northern iran
	id = rusfor.1066
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1066" }
	title = rusfor.1066.t
	desc = rusfor.1066.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -25
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
					transfer_state = 420
					transfer_state = 418
					transfer_state = 804
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER }
					add_to_faction = ROOT
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }					
					puppet = ROOT
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1067
				days = 2
				random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1068
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1067

	title = rusfor.1067.t
	desc = rusfor.1067.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1067.a #Hurray!
		add_political_power = 30
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
			transfer_state = 420
			transfer_state = 418
			transfer_state = 804
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER }
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }
			puppet = FROM
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1071
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1071" }
	title = rusfor.1071.t
	desc = rusfor.1071.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_allied_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_guaranteed_by = GER
					is_guaranteed_by = ENT
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				transfer_state = 1000
				transfer_state = 1001
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1072
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.b #Never! stand up!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1073
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #OTT/TUR accepts
	id = rusfor.1072
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1072" }
	title = rusfor.1072.t
	desc = rusfor.1072.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.a #Hurray!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_subject = ARM
					has_subject = GEO
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.b #Give the land to our puppets!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_subject = ARM
				has_subject = GEO
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = ARM
			}
			ARM = { transfer_state = 1000 }
			remove_state_claim = 1000
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1000
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = GEO
			}
			GEO = { transfer_state = 1001 }
			remove_state_claim = 1001
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1001
		}
	}
}

	title = rusfor.1080.t

				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = TRM }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.7
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism

country_event = { #Crush Transamur
	id = rusfor.1082
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1082" }
	title = rusfor.1082.t
	desc = rusfor.1082.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1082.a #all Russians must be under Russian rule! claim TRM
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = {
					OR = {
					is_subject_of = JAP
					is_in_faction_with = JAP
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
				JAP = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1084
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				JAP = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1083
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JAP }
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			TRM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.10877
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = TRM
				type = annex_everything
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						country_exists = YAK
						country_exists = BRY
						country_exists = SIB
					}
				}
				RUS = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.10820
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = TRM }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.7
					days = 1
				}
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #TRM Civil War- Russian Intervention
	id = rusfor.10820
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1082" }
	title = rusfor.10820.t
	desc = rusfor.10820.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10820.a #Intervene in the Civil War!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = SIB
			type = annex_everything
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = YAK
			type = annex_everything
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = BRY
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.10820.b #Only fight Transamur
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #The Russians claim Transamur!
	id = rusfor.1083
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1083" }
	title = rusfor.1083.t
	desc = rusfor.1083.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1083.a #Send a warning, Transamur is our protectorate!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1088
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1083.b #Abandon Transamur to its fate.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			TRM = {
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_INF_START
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_INF_TRADE
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_1
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_2
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_DEP_3
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_NAV_MIS
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_MIL_MIS
				remove_ideas = TRM_JAP_CONS
				remove_ideas = hino_automobile
				remove_ideas = nakajima_factory_vladivostok
			}
		}
		remove_from_faction = TRM
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRM
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10877
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

		text = rusfor.1116.d.baron
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes name = "Roman von Ungern-Sternberg" }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1116.d.other
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = { ruling_only = yes name = "Roman von Ungern-Sternberg" }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1116.a #Are they kidding? crush them!
		add_political_power = 20
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

			factor = 50
		}

		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1180.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1181
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vladivostok is Russian!
	id = rusfor.1208
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1208"}
	title = rusfor.1208.t
	desc = rusfor.1208.d
	#picture = GFX_petain_NFA

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.a #We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_EVENT_CV01_naval_variant = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			load_oob = RUS_TRM_NAVY_BIG
		}
		add_political_power = -80
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 50
			producer = RUS
		}
		408 = {
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex level = 2
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = dockyard
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_big
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			load_oob = SOV_TRM_NAVY_BIG
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.b #We shall merely use Transamur's old naval designs.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			load_oob = RUS_TRM_NAVY_SMALL
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_small
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 30
			producer = RUS
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			load_oob = SOV_TRM_NAVY_SMALL
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.c #Sell off Transamur's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		408 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.e #Sell off Transamur's navy and keep the money.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				state_population > 200000
				free_building_slots = {
					building = arms_factory
					size > 0
					include_locked = yes
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = rusfor.1210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1210" }
	title = rusfor.1210.t
	desc = rusfor.1210.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { has_subject = GAL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = { owns_state = 73 }
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1222
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROM = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1211
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1212
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #AUS accepts
	id = rusfor.1211
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1211" }
	title = rusfor.1211.t
	desc = rusfor.1211.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1211.a #great
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL
			annex_country = {
				target = GAL
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROM }
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #AUS refuses
	id = rusfor.1212
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1212" }
	title = rusfor.1212.t
	desc = rusfor.1212.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1212.a #then it's war
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1222
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1222" }
	title = rusfor.1222.t
	desc = rusfor.1222.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.1222.a #there is nothing we can do...

			factor = 95
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1222.b #resist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		RUS = {

				id = rusfor.1223

				random = 24
			}
		}

country_event = { #Russian claims FIN
	id = rusfor.1229
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1229" }
	title = rusfor.1229.t
	desc = rusfor.1229.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.a #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = FIN
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1230
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.b #All right.
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				840 = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_political_power = -150
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = received_equipment_5000
		random_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = {
					building = industrial_complex
					size > 0
					include_locked = yes
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1231
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.1231
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1231" }
	title = rusfor.1231.t
	desc = rusfor.1231.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1231.a #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		add_political_power = 50
		send_equipment = {
			target = FROM
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 5000
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 146 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { region = 13 } #Finland
					state = 146 #Viipuri
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #We've been defeated! FIN
	id = rusfor.1232
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1232" }
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1232.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }	
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1232.defeat
		trigger = {
			surrender_progress > 0.2	
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1232.d.defeat
		trigger = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1232.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		has_war_with = 219.owner
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_enemy_tag = 219.owner }
		var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
			is_russian_tag = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Finland loses
			surrender_progress > 0.2
			#Finland wins
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 195 #Petrograd
			AND = {
				controls_state = 213 #Murmansk
				controls_state = 215 #Kem
				controls_state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
				controls_state = 722 #Petsamo
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_FIN_offered_peace days = 90 value 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.2 }
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1232.a #Sue for peace!
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1233
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1232.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Finland?
	id = rusfor.1233
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1233" }
	title = rusfor.1233.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1233.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1233.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.a #Accept the peace offer!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
				FROM = { is_ai = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1234 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.b #No, they shall be crushed!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
				FROM = { is_ai = yes }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
			add_stability = -0.15
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1235 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Petrograd FIN
	id = rusfor.1234
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1234" }
	title = rusfor.1234.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1234.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1234.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 146 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { region = 13 } #Finland
					state = 146 #Viipuri
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_FIN }
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = rusfor.1236
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1236" }
	title = rusfor.1236.t
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = 219.owner
		owns_state = 78
		owns_state = 1222
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_enemy_tag = 219.owner }
		var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
			is_russian_tag = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 1222 # Bujak
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			#Romania wins
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kiev
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 791 #Podolia
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 203 #Cherkasy
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.15
					NOT = { controls_state = 78 }
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = rusfor.1238
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1238" }
	title = rusfor.1238.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 1222
					if = {
						limit = {
							FROM = { owns_state = 89 } #Stanislawow
						}
						state = 80 #Cernauti
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.b 
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			remove_state_claim = 1222
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1267
	title = rusfor.1267.t
	desc = rusfor.1267.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1267.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		WHR = {
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		puppet = WHR
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					WHR = { is_subject_of = GER }
				}
				GER = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.12722
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1268
					days = 45
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #WHR bonds
	id = rusfor.12677
	title = rusfor.12677.t
	desc = rusfor.12677.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.12677.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				GER = { has_war_with = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				WHR = { is_subject = no }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {

country_event = { #The Ottomans are Collapsing!
	id = rusfor.12810
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.12810" }
	title = rusfor.12810.t
	desc = rusfor.12810.d
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			1000 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = OTT
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
			1001 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = OTT
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.a #Seize Greater Armenia!
		OTT = {
			country_event = rusfor.12810
			hidden_effect = {
				every_enemy_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = EGY
							tag = PER
						}
					}
					country_event = rusfor.1281
				}
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.b #It's too risky.
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia wants to seize us! KUB
	id = rusfor.1282
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1282" }
	title = rusfor.1282.t
	desc = rusfor.1282.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1282.a #strike
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = rusfor.1283
			}
		}
		else = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = SOV
				type = annex_everything
			}
			SOV = {
				country_event = rusfor.1283
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1282.b #surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1284
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1284
					days = 1
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.1407.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.1407.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_manchuria = yes
				}
				MAN = {
					remove_state_core = yes
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 610
					state = 715
					state = 716
					state = 328
					state = 886
					state = 885
				}
			}
			MAN = {
				add_state_core = PREV
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		puppet = MAN
		MAN = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Konstantin Nechaev"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Konstantin_Nechaev.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = MAN_russian_party_long
				name = MAN_russian_party
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = MAN_ZRO
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_eurasian_integration
				days = 400
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 218
					region = 222
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = MAN
		}
		MAN = { save_global_event_target_as = china_ally_target }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1407.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.1420.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {	
		name = rusfor.1420.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1420.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				add = -40
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_political_power = -25
	}
}
country_event = { #approach japan
	id = rusfor.1421
	title = rusfor.1421.t
	desc = rusfor.1421.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {	
		name = rusfor.1421.a
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_political_power = 25
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt 
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #vladivostok captured
	id = rusfor.1422
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = SOV
		}
		controls_state = 408
		has_war_with = TRM
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1422.a
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { is_subject_of = JAP }
			}
			white_peace = JAP
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1422.b
		trigger = {
			TRM = { is_subject_of = JAP }
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = JAP
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Hidden failsafe event if TRM peaces out before Vladivostok is captured
	id = rusfor.14220
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = RUS
			tag = SOV
		}
		has_idea = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { exists = no }
	}
	option = {
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
	} 
}

country_event = { #Alaska
	id = rusfor.1423
	title = rusfor.1423.t
	desc = rusfor.1423.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1423.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		trigger = {
			ALA = { exists = no }
		}
		463 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1424
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1423.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			ALA = { exists = no }
		}
		463 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {

					days = 1
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 60
		}

			ALA = { exists = yes }
		}
		463 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {

country_event = { #Alaska
	id = rusfor.1425
	title = rusfor.1425.t
	desc = rusfor.1425.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1425.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		send_equipment = { target = FROM type = infantry_equipment amount = 25000 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_Alaska_Purchase
			days = 720
		}
		FROM = { 
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_Alaska_Sale
				days = 720
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 463
		hidden_effect = {
			set_province_name = { id = 13091 name = "Ankoridzh" }
			463 = { set_state_name = "Alyaska" }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1425.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1425.c
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1429
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
