country_event = { #green vozhd
	id = rusfor.1435
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1435" }
	title = rusfor.1435.t
	desc = rusfor.1435.d
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_vozhd

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1435.a
		hidden_effect = {	
			kill_country_leader = yes
			
			create_country_leader = {
			    name = "Pavel Gorgulov"
			    desc = "POLITICS_GORGULOV_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Gorgulov_Vohzd.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = { green_vozhd }
			}
	    }
    }
}
	
country_event = { #Alaska Integration
	id = rusfor.1436
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1436.t
	desc = rusfor.1436.d
	trigger = {
		tag =  ALA
		OR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			is_subject_of = SOV
			is_subject_of = TRM
		}
		NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1436.a
		set_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS
		hidden_effect = {
			set_province_name = { id = 13091 name = "Ankoridzh" }
			463 = { set_state_name = "Alyaska" }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
				name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1965.1.1"
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}	 
	
country_event = { #Independent Alaska
	id = rusfor.1437
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1437" }
	title = rusfor.1437.t
	desc = rusfor.1437.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = CAN
					is_subject_of = JAP
				}
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.c
		trigger = {
			ALA = { is_subject_of = CAN }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		CAN = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1439
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.d
		trigger = {
			ALA = { is_subject_of = JAP }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		JAP = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1439
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Russia Demands Puppet Alaska
	id = rusfor.1439
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1429.t
	desc = rusfor.1429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1439.a #Let them decide but we won't back them up militarily.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1440
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1429.e #We're keeping it.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1441
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Surrender
		name = rusfor.1429.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ALA
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}	 

country_event = { # Puppet Alaska - On Our Own
	id = rusfor.1440
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1440.t
	desc = rusfor.1440.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.a # Surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.b # We'll fight, but we're on our own.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ALA
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	
	}
}

country_event = { # Puppet Alaska - Protected
	id = rusfor.1441
	title = rusfor.1441.t
	desc = rusfor.1441.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1428.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -20
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1434.b
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					is_in_faction_with = CAN
				}
				ALA = {
					is_subject_of = CAN
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		RUS = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = ALA
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Alaska Surrenders
	id = rusfor.1442
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1442.t
	desc = rusfor.1442.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1442.a
		puppet = ALA
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Fate of Turkestan
	id = rusfor.1443
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1443" }
	title = rusfor.1443.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.united
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.notunited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
		}
	}				
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1444
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1447
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				tag = SOV
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1453
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1456
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.g
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
			OR = {
				KYR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				UZB = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				TRK = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = KYR
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					KYR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = UZB
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					UZB = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = TRK
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					TRK = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		trigger = {
			RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1459
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = rusfor.1444
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1444" }
	title = rusfor.1444.t
	desc = rusfor.1444.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1444.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				tag = KYR
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -40
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1445
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1444.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				tag = KYR
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1446
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # Turkestan agreed
	id = rusfor.1445
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1445" }
	title = rusfor.1445.t
	desc = rusfor.1445.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1445.a
		FROM = { get_current_government_type = yes }
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		FROM = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_socialist_government = no
			}
			FROM = { set_cosmetic_tag = UTR_autonomy } 
		}
	}
}

		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1449
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1447.c

			base = 45
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				tag = UZB
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -40
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		FROM = {

				id = rusfor.1452
				days = 3
			}
		}

country_event = { # Turkestan agreed
	id = rusfor.1460
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1460" }
	title = rusfor.1460.t
	desc = rusfor.1460.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1460.a
		hidden_effect = {
			annex_country = { target = FROM }
		}
		584 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
		UZB = {
			transfer_state = 861
			add_state_core = 861
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = UZB
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		UZB = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			clr_country_flag = UZB_republic
			add_ideas = {
				UZB_Sayid_Abdullah_hog_pau
				UZB_Alisher_Ivanov_for_ade
				UZB_Bahauddin_Gorchakov_eco_ade
				UZB_Boris_Dmitrievsky_sec_sde
				TRK_last_of_genghis_khans 
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = {
					TRK_central_asian_repubic 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_1 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_2
					TRK_minorities_protected 
					TRK_soviet_insurgency  
					TRK_totalism   
					TRK_totalism_1    
					TRK_syndicalism     
					TRK_syndicalism_1      
					TRK_agrarian_socialism       
					TRK_agrarian_socialism_1        
					TRK_fraternization 
				}
			}
		}
		TRK = {
			transfer_state = 405
			transfer_state = 585
			transfer_state = 732
			add_state_core = 405
			add_state_core = 585
			add_state_core = 732
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRK
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		TRK = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				TRK_Ibrahim_Bek_hog_pau
				TRK_Mukhtar_Dzhangalin_for_ade
				TRK_Adilet_Rustamov_eco_ade
				TRK_Kush_Beggi_sec_pau
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir_1
							has_idea = TRK_legacy_of_emir_2
						}
					}
				}
				add_ideas = TRK_legacy_of_emir
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = {
					TRK_central_asian_repubic 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_1 
					TRK_central_asian_repubic_2
					TRK_minorities_protected 
					TRK_soviet_insurgency  
					TRK_totalism   
					TRK_totalism_1    
					TRK_syndicalism     
					TRK_syndicalism_1      
					TRK_agrarian_socialism       
					TRK_agrarian_socialism_1        
					TRK_fraternization 
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1462
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1462" }
	title = rusfor.1462.t
	desc = rusfor.1462.d
	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		OR = {
			has_war_with = RUS
			has_war_with = SOV
		}
		NOT = { country_exists = TRM }
		408 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		409 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		408 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1463
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1463
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1463" }
	title = rusfor.1463.t
	desc = rusfor.1463.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_asia = yes
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		JAP = { transfer_state = 408 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 409 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 637 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 562 }
		637 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		562 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_chinese_tag = yes
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			release = PREV
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.5
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1464
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1464" }

country_event = { # UTR-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1465
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1465" }
	title = rusfor.1465.t
	desc = rusfor.1465.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1465.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		white_peace = FROM
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = FROM
					is_subject_of = FROM
				}
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_UTR_peace
	}
}

	desc = russianews.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_savinkov

		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.1.a
	}
}

	id = russianews.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.8" }
	title = russianews.8.t
	desc = russianews.8.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_tsardom_restored

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.8.a
	}
}

	id = russianews.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.9" }
	title = russianews.9.t
	desc = russianews.9.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_SOV_civil_war_victory

	major = yes

		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.9.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.9.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}

	desc = russoc.212.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.212.a
		add_political_power = 150
		add_stability = 0.10
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_party_name = { 
            ideology = totalist 
            long_name = SOV_tukh_party_long 
            name = SOV_tukh_party 
        }
		#hidden_effect = {
		#    news_event = { id = russianews.109 days = 7 }
		#}
	}
}

	id = russoc.216
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.216" }
	title = russoc.216.t
	desc = russoc.216.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.216.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = UKR
					tag = WHR
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = ALO
					tag = MTR
					tag = TRK
					tag = KYR
					tag = UZB
					tag = MON
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = SOV_AUT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Savinkov Portrait
	id = russia.10000
	title = russia.10000.t 
	desc = russia.10000.d 
	picture = GFX_Savinkov_Portrait_Event

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov3.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov4.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov2.png"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		if = {	
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Boris Savinkov" ruling_only = yes } }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {
				portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov.png"
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russia.10000.f
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #force RUS to collapse if the war drags on too long
	id = russia.1919
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		SOV = { is_ai = yes }
		surrender_progress > 0
	}

	option = {
		force_capitulate = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #soviet generals
	id = russia.1923
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russia.1923.t
	desc = russia.1923.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1923.a
		bolsheviks_gome_home = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1923.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}


### Renaming cities by Nicolay Romanov ###
country_event = { #Peterburg 
    id = russia.2006
    title = russia.2006.t
    desc = russia.2006.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Gorod_na_Neve_event

    fire_only_once = yes

    is_triggered_only = yes

    option = { #a great idea!
        name = russia.2006.a

        set_province_name = { id = 6174 name = "Sankt-Peterburg"}
        195 = { set_state_name = "Sankt-Peterburg" }
    }
    option = { #
        name = russia.2006.b


    }
}

    id = russia.144
    immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.144" }
    title = russia.144.t
    desc = russia.144.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

    option = {
        name = russia.144.a
        set_province_name = { id = 3134 name = "Romanov-na-Murmane" }
        hidden_effect = {
            213 = { set_state_name = "Romanov-na-Murmane" }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = russia.144.b
    }
}

        }

			OR = {
				NOT = { original_tag = SOV }
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_GOR }

					has_government = totalist

			}

			days = 0

    id = russia.2011
    title = russia.2011.t
    desc = russia.2011.d

			RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
		}
        set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Savinkovsk"}

    }

        name = russia.2011.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Kirill I"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
        set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Vladimir-na-Pregele"}

    }
    option = { # 
        name = russia.2011.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Dmitriy III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Pavel II"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
        set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Dmitri-na-Pregele"}

    }
    option = { #

				name = "Pyotr IV"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}

    }
    option = { # 
        name = russia.2011.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}

    }
    option = { #

				name = "Georgy Zhukov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}

    option = { #

				name = "Mikhail Frunze"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
        set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Frunzensk"}

    }
	option = { #

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				RUS_denikin_in_power = yes
				RUS_wrangel_in_power = yes
			}
		}
        set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Kornilovsk"}

    }
	option = { #

		trigger = {
			has_government = totalist
		}

	}
	option = { # go back
        name = russia.2012.e

        country_event = {
			id = russia.2010
			days = 0
		}
    }
}
